THE JEANS REDESIGN X ZARA Following the principles of the circular economy, this denim collection is designed with its whole life cycle in mind.The Ellen MacArthur Foundation works to accelerate the transition to a circular economy, working with businesses, academia, policymakers, and institutions to mobilize systems solutions at scale, globally

THE JEANS REDESIGN X ZARA Following the principles of the circular economy, this denim collection is designed with its whole life cycle in mind.The Ellen MacArthur Foundation works to accelerate the transition to a circular economy, working with businesses, academia, policymakers, and institutions to mobilize systems solutions at scale, globally #joinlife #joinlifezara

THE JEANS REDESIGN X ZARA The Jeans Redesign is a project by the Ellen MacArthur Foundation. Insights were gathered from more than 80 industry experts from across academia, brands, retailers, manufacturing, collectors, sorters, and NGOs to collaboratively define guidelines to design and make jeans fit for a circular economy, today #joinlife #joinlifezara

ZARA ORIGINS. PERMANENT COLLECTION. Throughout the design process of the new collection of timeless wardrobe pieces that offers styles suitable to be worn across all months, Antonio Vivaldi's "Four Seasons" became the soundtrack and inspiration for the project @zaraman #zaraman #zaraoriginsPhotography by @jamie.hawkesworth

ZARA ORIGINS. PERMANENT COLLECTION. Zara Origins is a project focused upon building a contemporary wardrobe. The aim is to conceive, create and offer garments which are newly-refined archetypes of their kind, fabricated in the finest materials, and manufactured with high standards of expertise and craft. It harnesses progressive design to combine modern concepts with outstanding value.Photographs by @jamie.hawkesworth #zaraorigins @zaraman

Narciso Rodriguez x Zara. Making clothes has always been deeply personal for the American designer Narciso Rodriguez—“My strength is my fabrics, my ateliers, my hands,” he once said—and the result is a self-possessed style that is timeless, realistic and suggestive. Those qualities, the very essence of modern fashion, are now being celebrated by Zara in a special collaboration with Rodriguez, a prospect for women thrilled for his look #narcisorodriguezxzara @narciso_rodriguez Photographs @craigmcdeanstudioModel @natasupernovaStyling @ludivinepoiblancMake up @diane.kendal using #zarabeauty

The ZARA ATELIER Collection. An exaggerated baby-doll dress made of a light cotton voile in an ecru tone contrasts with the carmine and scarlet reds of the extraordinary embroideries, which showcase the technical artistry involved in this collection #zaraatelier #zarawoman

The ZARA ATELIER Collection. A patchwork bodice in shades of orange made up of sequins and small beads form a delicate structure that takes on further prominence thanks to the mix of extraordinary textiles, vibrant strips of colour and a quilted fabric with abstract floral motifs #zaraatelier #zarawoman

The ZARA ATELIER Collection. A romantic, punk universe is the backdrop for this V-neck dress, made up of a combination of textured, delicate chiffons and floral jacquard fabrics #zaraatelier #zarawoman

Collection 02_The Dress presents six dresses with their own identity in that each one dominates a style and singular pattern. Embellishments, embroidery, and fabrics are the stars of these pieces replete with curated details. #zaraatelier #zarawoman

The ZARA ATELIER line was born in 2021 with the objective of reinterpreting the staples of the feminine wardrobe in an artistic, different and sophisticated way through high scale design and exquisite craftsmanship. These concepts continue to be the driving force for both collections, and will remain so in the next capsules #zaraatelier #zarawoman

The collection 02 from the ZARA ATELIER line is now a reality. If the first capsule focused on the exterior garment par excellence - the coat - the design team at Zara is now putting another iconic piece on the line: the dress. #zaraatelier #zarawoman

RENEWCELL X ZARAThe collaboration with Renewcell is part of our Sustainability Innovation Hub, a platform for testing and promoting start-up initiatives to develop new technologies, materials and processes to limit the environmental impact of our products and move towards more sustainable solutions.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

RENEWCELL X ZARA. THE PROCESSThe used garments and offcuts from textile production are recovered and the buttons and zippers are removed for recycling. The fibres are decoloured, the remains of polyester, elastane and other components are separated, and what remains is pure cellulose pulp from the cotton alone.The pulp is dehydrated and pressed into CIRCULOSE®️ sheets, which will be sent to viscose fibre producers. They dissolve the CIRCULOSE®️ sheets and mix it with new virgin pulp wood, in line with Inditex Forest Products Policy, to obtain the final viscose fibre.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

RENEWCELL X ZARAThis technology dissolves cotton cellulose from textile waste and transforms it into a new material called CIRCULOSE®️. By reusing an existing resource, it helps us move towards circularity.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

Through the Sustainability Innovation Hub we are collaborating with different partners to bring more innovation into our products and to support them to scaleup their initiatives. We believe innovation and collaboration is key in moving forward in this journey.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

LanzaTech technology produces ethanol from carbon emissions through a process of fermentation, just like yeast converts sugar into alcohol. This gas fermentation technology enables the conversion of carbon from industry, agriculture, and household waste. The resulting ethanol can be used to make the PET used in polyester yarn.The final PET contains 20% MEG (Monoethylene Glycol) made from recycled carbon emissions and 80% PTA (Purified Terephthalic Acid).#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

STARTUP LANZATECH X ZARA. LanzaTech, Inc. is a startup that converts carbon emissions into new materials such as polyester.Capturing and repurposing carbon emissions from industrial processes, limits the direct release of these emissions into the atmosphere and helps limit the use of virgin fossil resources.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

INFINITED FIBER X ZARAThis partnership represents an advancement in recycling by uniting technology and innovation to create a circular fiber. We understand the unique sustainability challenges of the fashion industry, which is why we are working to find solutions, searching for new partnerships, processes and materials to help limit our impact. #JOINLIFE #INNOVATION

INFINITED FIBER X ZARAInfinited Fiber Company is a fashion and textile technology group that has developed an innovative solution to turn cellulose-rich materials, such as worn-out clothes, into a textile fiber that looks and feels like cotton. #JOINLIFE #INNOVATION

INFINITED FIBER X ZARA is the second collaboration of Zara's Sustainability Innovation Hub, through which we work on different projects that help us promote and scale initiatives to make our products more sustainable. #JOINLIFE #INNOVATION

Through the Sustainability Innovation Hub we are collaborating with different partners to bring more innovation into our products and to support them to scaleup their initiatives. We believe innovation and collaboration is key in moving forward in this journey.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

LanzaTech technology produces ethanol from carbon emissions through a process of fermentation, just like yeast converts sugar into alcohol. This gas fermentation technology enables the conversion of carbon from industry, agriculture, and household waste. The resulting ethanol can be used to make the PET used in polyester yarn. The final PET contains 20% MEG (Monoethylene Glycol) made from recycled carbon emissions and 80% PTA (Purified Terephthalic Acid). #INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

STARTUP LANZATECH X ZARA. LanzaTech, Inc. is a startup that converts carbon emissions into new materials such as polyester.Capturing and repurposing carbon emissions from industrial processes, limits the direct release of these emissions into the atmosphere and helps limit the use of virgin fossil resources.#INNOVATION #JOINLIFE

ZARA ORIGINS is a project focused upon building a contemporary wardrobe. The aim is to conceive, create and offer garments which are newly-refined archetypes of their kind, fabricated in fine materials, and manufactured to high standards of expertise and craft. #zaraorigins

Family isn't one-size-fits-all. With this campaign we're supporting @free.equal and their initiative for equal rights and fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans and intersex people around the world. 🏳️‍🌈 #HMPride

Meet @lolarodriguez @soyambrossi and @javviercalvo 💙💚 This family met while filming a TV series together, directed by Los Javis and starring Lola. Since then, they do everything together: from working and partying to dancing and cooking. #HMPride

The Dreamers ☁️ featuring @reetaloi @sakeemathecrook @toriwest and @jamie_windust are tied together by their hopes and dreams for tomorrow. Family time is their chance to just relax and have fun. #HMPride

Meet The Angels 👼 featuring @nashmariah @martinmagner @jana_babez @mavusomabuso. This chosen family fell in love on the dancefloor in Cape Town. They love getting dressed up and treat the pre-party like their family meeting. #HMPride
A chosen family is made up of people who have intentionally chosen to love and support one another. Just like the families in our #HMPride 2022 campaign. Get to know them at hm.com.
Family is the people who love you, no matter who you love. For this year’s #HMPride, we celebrate the families who choose each other. 🤍💖🤎🖤❤️🧡💛💚💜💙

Whether outdoors or using water and air for production, we strive to leave it as we found it. By 2040, our DS (Device Solutions) division aims to apply new technologies that remove air and water pollutants emitted during the semiconductor manufacturing process and treat them before being discharged to ensure they have almost no additional impact on the environment.
#Samsung

To address the issue of air pollution, we are looking at ways to mitigate the environmental impact of our production sites. 
Samsung is playing a pioneering role in developing carbon capture and utilization technologies through our Carbon Capture Research Institute as well as clean air filtration systems to reduce particulate matter. Through both efforts, we strive to create eco-conscious techniques and innovations not just for us, but our entire industry.
#Samsung

Expanding our innovations doesn’t have to increase our environmental impact. 
The demand for semiconductors is at an all-time high, and that has an impact on our daily water withdrawal. With the latest additions to our semiconductor production lines in Korea, we’ve challenged ourselves to maintain our water withdrawal levels so that by 2030, our daily water withdrawal aims to be as it was in 2021.
#Samsung

From landfills to long term solutions, we don’t want to just talk about improving resource circularity.We expect all global sites to obtain gold certification for zero-waste to landfill from Underwriters Laboratories by 2023 and platinum certification by 2025.#Samsung

Not letting waste go to waste. That’s circular economy thinking.Next-gen products like the Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 are already being made using plastics from discarded fishing nets, and we are working toward having 50% of our plastic parts include recycled resin across our products by 2030, increasing to 100% by 2050, for the next generation of people who call this world home.#Samsung

We currently take back appliance waste from approximately 50 countries, but helping the whole world requires a global effort.By 2030, we plan to expand our takeback program to reach approximately all 180 countries we do business in. Through this, our goal is to collect a cumulative 10 million tons between 2009 and 2030, the highest target in the industry, and a cumulative 25 million tons by 2050.#Samsung

Every component of our products is a piece of our energy solution.By developing ultra-low power memory products, our DS (Device Solutions) division is working to significantly reduce the annual power consumption of memory products used in data centers and mobile devices.For smartphones, refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, TVs, monitors, and PCs, we plan to tap new low-power technologies for major models to further reduce energy consumption by 30% by 2030 (compared to products with the same specifications in 2019).#Samsung

Nature can only do so much. The rest is up to us.We’re actively putting in the work to make our DX (Device eXperience) division completely net-zero by 2030. Corporate-level net-zero is expected to be at the foundation of all our business operations by 2050. Achieving our goal of hitting net zero lets us avoid the CO2 equivalent of what 2 billion pine trees could absorb in a year, or the same as removing around 8 million vehicles off the roads.#Samsung

Shaping a better world for everyone is our goal, and we’re not alone. By converting to 100% renewable energy from our operations outside of Korea and DX (Device eXperience) division by 2027, and using 100% renewable energy by 2050 for all operations globally, Samsung is committed to our role as a member of the #RE100.We’re working closely with various stakeholders to build a better ecosystem of renewable energy.#Samsung

The SolarCell Remote, our eco superhero. And we don't want to keep this innovation to ourselves! We are releasing our SolarCell Remote Technology to EVERYONE 📢🥳 Find out more at: http://smsng.co/SolarCellRemoteTech #Sustainability #SolarCellRemote #Samsung

We recently announced our new commitment to take a meaningful step forward for the environment.As part of this, we gathered a group of children aged 6 to 9 and asked them one question: “What would you invent for a better planet?” Danielle’s invention is designed to tackle climate change—and your ideas can help us create a more sustainable world too. We’re listening. #Samsung

We recently announced our new commitment to take a meaningful step forward for the environment.As part of this, we gathered a group of children aged 6 to 9 and asked them one question: “What would you invent for a better planet?” Levi’s invention is designed to reduce greenhouse gases—and your ideas can help us create a more sustainable world too. We’re listening. #Samsung

Small but smart technology for a safe and secure life on the road. 🛣️

@Leonardo.di.chiara is an architect who lives and works in a tiny house on wheels, therefore security is essential to him. He uses our portable security assistant @boschspexor to help keep his mobile home safe, wherever it is parked. This smart assistant performs several helpful tasks at once, but crucially, it doesn’t take up a lot of space in Leonardo’s small surroundings.

spexor's intelligent sensors monitor air quality, and room temperature and can detect hazardous substances such as high levels of pollen and fire gasses. It can also sense movement inside the mobile home, and if it detects a problem, a push notification is sent to Leonardo’s smartphone which allows him to check the safety and security of his tiny house remotely. 📱

#smarttechnology #smartliving #IoT #internetofthings #sensors #homesecurity #tinyhouse #tinyhousemovement #sustainabliity #modernnomad

Could you live in a house that’s only 9 square meters in size? 🤔🏠

Meet Italian architect @leonardo.di.chiara, a modern nomad who lives in a tiny house on wheels. To help him live and work sustainably and comfortably in this small space, he has equipped his home with our smart technology. 

Inside, our portable security assistant @boschspexor monitors air quality and can detect fires and other hazards, while our @boschdiyandgarden digital laser measure helps Leonardo plan and measure for his architecture projects. When on the move, he travels on a cargo bike ePowered by @boschebikesystems, and our Eyes Outdoor Camera helps keep his tiny house safe and secure by letting him monitor what’s happening around his home, as well as acting as an intercom system and outdoor lighting. 

These are just a few of the ways our smart technology is helping Leonardo to live a more sustainable and efficient life in his tiny surroundings.

#smarttechnology #IoT #internetofthings #tinyhouse #tinyhousemovement #sustainabliity #modernnomad

💧Helping to make water easily accessible all year round: The region of Trimbakeshwar in India receives an abundance of rainfall during monsoon seasons. However, in recent years its villages have been struggling with water scarcity due to the rainwater not being absorbed into the ground.

Our @bosch.india plant is located nearby and its corporate responsibility team wanted to support the people in the region. Working together with local people and organizations, their aim was to find and implement new methods for the ground to collect water and new ways to replenish wells that had run dry.

Over the last three years, over 80 dams have been built, river banks have been repaired, reservoirs have been dug, and infiltration ponds have been built as part of the project. This has improved the quality of life of those who live in Trimbakeshwar greatly: They no longer have to walk several miles to collect drinking water, and millet farmers were able to increase the number of harvests from one to three times per year.🚰🌾

#csr #corporatesocialresponsibility #cleanwater #agriculture #agricultureindia #farming

⚡🔋 🚘 Driving the transition to alternative mobility: As the global demand for electromobility continues to increase, we have been ramping up our global production network.

One example of this is the recently launched production of electric motors at our Charleston, U.S., manufacturing facility and plan to invest more than $260 million to further expand production of electrification products at the site.

Covering approximately 200,000 square feet, the new assembly area will include the production of rotors and stators, and the final assembly of electric motors that will drive electric vehicles on the roads in the United States.

#electriccar #evehicles #emobility #technology #mobility #electromobility #electricvehicle #electricdrive

Throwing and catching are useful skills. But what if robots could learn these actions, just like humans? 🤖 
 
Timm Linder, a Bosch research engineer and expert for 3D perception and scene understanding,  joins our hosts on this month's episode of our "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" podcast. Timm is working on an EU-funded project called DARKO, where he is developing a robot that will soon be able to throw objects in warehouses. Timm and his colleagues aim to make these robots more intelligent by giving them better 3D perception to navigate and operate in different environments around them, which could speed up industrial activities. 
 
Listen to this episode on podcast platforms such as Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, and Spotify. Simply search for “From KNOW-HOW to WOW” and get ready to be wowed. 🎧😎 
 
#podcast #robots #robotics #technology #IoT #internetofthings

🌲🎨 Turning scrap wood into art: Wood sculptor @adamdetredesigns is based in Fiskars, Finland. He uses our cordless @BoschProfessionalEurope tools to work on surplus wood that has been used, abandoned, or damaged.
 
Adam spends many hours in strenuous positions to shape these large pieces, which means he requires his tools to have endurance, precision, and comfort. Thanks to the ergonomic design of the tools, Adam can focus and immerse himself in his work: "The balance really makes a difference if I have to work for a long time. With Bosch Professional, it really feels that the tool fits and sits well in the hand," says Adam.

#boschprofessional #boschtools #powertools #woodworking #sculptor #woodsculptor #artist

🚘🤩 The Maserati MC20 is one of the most exclusive and desired super cars – but how do you build a car like this? 🛠️

By using a connected Industry 4.0 solution from Bosch Rexroth! At each of the 63 work stations at the Maserati plant in Modena, Italy, operators working on the MC20 use our special @boschrexroth_global NEXO wireless screwdriver. Integrated with the production software, it ensures tightening safety and ease of installation, as well as high flexibility in production activities.

The @Maserati MC20 also features Bosch technology on board, like our state-of-the-art engine control unit. As the brain of the car, it allows the engine to adapt to different driving styles, finding the best compromise between maximum performance, when racing on track, and maintaining fuel efficiency, when driving at ordinary road speeds.

#MaseratiMC20 #supercars #supercar #vehicle #vehicletechnology #industry40 #productiontechnology

Did you know that every component of our eBike system contains software? 🤔🚲💻

The individual pieces have to communicate with each other to enable features across components, such as switching on the eBike lights or installing a software update via the smartphone app. 📲

From software architects to developers to testers: Multiple mixed teams work as part of the Agile Release Train at Bosch eBike Systems on developing the software for each of these components. Testing an eBike's software is also part of the software development cycle. To do this, our test riders use their eBikes for example to commute or on our test track. 🚲🔋

#ebike #ebikesystems #softwaredeveloper #softwarearchitect #softwaretest #software #development

🤔 Did you know that in 1929 we improved the safety gas switch for gas burners used in central heating systems? Instead of taking several minutes to activate, this new technology could now do so in a matter of seconds. ⏱️ Reducing the risk of gas poisoning or explosions allowed people to live comfortably with both heating and hot water in their homes. 🏡 This innovation also set the groundwork for our modern energy-efficient heating technology and water solutions such as the heat pump. In 1975, we introduced the prototype of a heat pump that generated heat from groundwater. Today, as a result of heat pumps utilizing renewable energy and consequently lowering CO2 emissions, they are a crucial part in the construction of new buildings. As a climate-friendly alternative, they can also be installed in existing buildings as part of a heat pump hybrid solution. 🌍🍃#heating #safety #technology #renewableenergy #reduceemissions

🍺🌲 Zoomed in: How can beer be produced in an eco-friendly way? With the help of little woodchips! Join our Bosch Global team member Lukas as he explores the Rothaus brewery and experiences how Bosch helps to lower their CO₂ emissions.Brewing beer needs a lot of energy. To make beer production more sustainable, we started an energy partnership with the @badischestaatsbrauereirothaus in Germany more than 10 years ago. Our solution: We’ve implemented and are continuously operating an automated biomass boiler system that delivers thermal energy for the brewing process, bottle washing, and beyond – covering 70% of the brewery’s energy needs. To operate the boiler system, we use woodchips from the surrounding Black Forest – a regrowing, CO₂-neutral resource that is locally sourced and available all year round. #energysolutions #energy #ecofriendly #sustainability #beer #rothaus #blackforest

🍺🌲 What's the connection between woodchips, beer, and Bosch? 🤔 Follow along on our channel to find out! We'll soon share a look inside the Rothaus brewery and show you how Bosch helps make their beer production more eco-friendly.#energysolutions #energy #ecofriendly #beer #rothaus #schwarzwald

Do you frequently travel by coach? 🚍🌍🙋‍♂️🙋‍♀️Coaches are often used for intercity and international travel – so entertainment is an important aspect for passengers on these long-distance journeys. 😉 At this year's IAA Transportation trade fair, we're presenting our Coach Future Cockpit System and Coach Future Cabin System, which turn coaches into a digital network on wheels, meeting drivers' and passengers' needs alike. 📦🛒 From getting an online order delivered to your home to buying groceries from the supermarket: Many things we do as part of our everyday life require the transportation of goods. To make the commercial vehicles of tomorrow more sustainable, we're developing a variety of solutions. 🌇 Take city traffic, for example: Vans and medium-sized trucks are the beating heart of urban goods traffic. 🚚 Powered electrically, they are locally emissions-free and also contribute to better air quality and reduce noise pollution. 🔇 To drive electromobility in such light commercial vehicles, we've now started the volume production of a new drive unit which can be integrated even easier into new and existing vehicle models.  And when it comes to longer journeys and heavier vehicles, we're working on equipping not just trucks but also vans with our fuel-cell technology. A recent test operation on the roads has shown: With a refueling time of just six minutes, these vans can travel for up to 540 kilometers while producing zero local emissions. 🍃#BoschIAA #IAATransportation #IAA22 #futuremobility #fuelcell #electromobility #commercialvehicles

Did you know that our Bosch Car Service is the world's largest brand-independent workshop network, with more than 15,000 workshops in 150 countries? 🌍 With the ever-growing complexity in vehicle technology, today's workshops have to know their way around many types of vehicles – from combustion engines, to electric, hybrid, and even fuel-cell powertrains. To help mechanics carry out diagnostics, maintenance, and repair work, we're developing new testing and digital diagnostic tools, as well as services for all workshops.One example is our latest adjustment and calibration tool for the sensors and cameras that support modern driver assistance systems. We're currently presenting this, and many more of our latest products, solutions, and our wide range of spare parts for providing Car Service #LikeABosch, at the Automechanika trade fair in Frankfurt, Germany. 🙌 #automechanika #automechanikafrankfurt #vehicletechnology #automobile #vehicle #vehiclediagnostics #digitalization

🚚🍃 Welcome to the future of more sustainable long-distance mobility: Thanks to our fuel-cell powertrain technology, hydrogen trucks with zero local CO2 emissions are being road-tested in Chongqing, China. The power module is the core component of our fuel-cell powertrain. It triggers a chemical reaction of hydrogen and oxygen to make water and generate the required electrical energy. 💧⚡ But there’s more to this system: It also includes a battery to store electricity, an electric motor to drive the rear wheels, and an electronic control unit that regulates energy flows to the powertrain. The lessons the test drivers learn will help ensure that future mass-manufactured fuel-cell trucks can operate out on the road. 🛣️#mobility #zeroemissions #sustainability #fuelcell #fuelcellpowertrain #BoschIAA #IAA22

🚚💧 An endurance test is underway in China, and Hu Gang is one of the test drivers assessing 70 trucks equipped with our fuel-cell powertrain technology.Our fuel-cell system has several benefits for long-distance drivers: It has a refill time of just five to ten minutes, it doesn’t have any engine noise, just the hum of the cooling fan, and it accelerates faster than any truck with a combustion engine. But this is not all: "This promising technology is extremely interesting. I would like to help it become established," says Hu Gang. "My truck doesn’t emit a gram of CO₂ while driving. And if we succeed in producing the hydrogen without using fossil energy sources, it will be a completely carbon-neutral powertrain." 🌏🍃#mobility #zeroemissions #sustainability #fuelcell #fuelcellpowertrain #technology #BoschIAA #IAA22

🚚🍃 Zoomed in: How can long-haul trucks become more sustainable? With our fuel-cell powertrain technology! In Chongqing, China, 70 hydrogen-powered trucks equipped with our fuel-cell system are being tested out on the road. 🛣️ They can travel more than 500 kilometers on a full tank holding 11.7 kilograms of hydrogen, the powertrain is light in weight, and by producing zero local CO2 emissions it helps make operating trucks more sustainable. 👏 #mobility #electromobility #electrification #fuelcell #fuelcelltechnology #hydrogen

What's for dinner tonight? And who is going to prepare it? 👨‍🍳👩‍🍳🍲These are two questions that many people are familiar with – and cooking meals that are healthy and full of flavor can be challenging. That's why we're continuously developing technology to help you make healthy meals with ease. 🙌One example is our Series 8 oven with the new Steam Function Plus. Thanks to the combination of up to 120-degree Celsius hot air and steam, food like potatoes, beetroot, lentils, and carrots can be cooked 35 percent faster than with pure steam cooking, while still preserving the food's nutrients. With the @homeconnectapp and a built-in camera, we're also taking away the stress from worrying about the perfect cooking time: The camera monitors the progress of the food inside the oven. Once the specified degree of browning is reached, it sends a push notification to your phone. The program then switches off, and your food is ready to be enjoyed – perfectly cooked to your preferences. 😋➡️ Check out our Bosch Home Instagram channels like @boschhomede for more information on our home appliances and recipe suggestions. #cookingathome #homeappliances #easyliving #homecooking #athome #easycooking

How do you teach a car to "act" on what's happening around it? The powertrain, brakes, and steering system are the muscle power of self-driving cars – the vehicle's computer sends signals to the different parts to put the planned driving strategy into practice. 💪🚘At Bosch, we are working to develop new technologies to progress the future of self-driving vehicles. For example, with our "steer-by-wire" system. Here, the steering technology no longer relies on a mechanical connection between the steering wheel and the vehicle's wheels, instead it uses precise sensor technology to determine the driver's intention and execute it for maximum comfort and safety.#automateddriving #selfdrivingcars #autonomouscar #automatedvehicle #futuremobility #technology

How do you enable a self-driving car to "think" and understand what's happening around it? By giving it some serious brain power for learning and planning driving maneuvers. 🧠🚘Self-driving cars decide in real time which strategy is best for different traffic and driving conditions. To do this, automated systems rely on data – collected for instance by their on-board sensors. This data is processed by the vehicle computer using AI driven software, which can, for example, distinguish between various objects such as pedestrians, cyclists, buildings, and other vehicles. 🚶🚴🏢🚋#automateddriving #selfdrivingcars #futuremobility #sensors #AI #artificialintelligence

How do you teach a car to "sense" what's happening around it? 👀🚘Automated vehicles need a reliable and precise understanding of their surroundings in order to move driverlessly in real traffic situations. With our technology, we enable cars to "sense" what's going on around them – we're basically giving them the same skills that human drivers require, but better! For this, we use for example cameras, radar, ultrasonic, and lidar sensors. With the data collected by these sensors, automated cars can adapt their driving behavior to their environment. This supports anticipatory driving, which makes traffic more efficient and leads to greater safety for all road users. Interested in getting to know more about automated driving? Then make sure to follow us and stay tuned for our next post to learn how we're teaching cars to "think". #automateddriving #automatedmobility #autonomousdriving #selfdrivingcars #futuremobility #sensors

On the road with hydrogen-powered trucks. 🚚💧 In the latest episode of our “From KNOW-HOW to WOW” podcast, you can learn how Bosch fuel cell technology is helping companies like @nikolamotorcompany operate trucks with zero local CO² emissions. 🌎🍃Our podcast hosts are joined by Bosch engineer Michael Marino, team leader in fuel cell engineering. He explains how fuel cell stacks convert hydrogen into electricity and power large vehicles that are quieter and accelerate quicker than trucks with combustion engines. Intrigued? Let's get on the road! 🛣️Listen to this episode and more on podcast platforms such as Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, and Spotify. Simply search for "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" and get ready to be wowed. 🎧😎#podcast #sustainability #mobility #fuelcells #emissions #zeroemissions

💧🦐 How can shrimp farming be made easier and more sustainable? By using sensors and artificial intelligence. 💻🦾 @aquaeasy.life is a solution developed by one of the start-ups from our internal incubator and home of Bosch intrapreneurs "grow platform". Using underwater microphones, the system for example allows for the feeding sounds of the shrimp to be captured and analyzed by artificial intelligence, giving farmers the data needed to adjust feeding time and quantity. Sensors also monitor the water quality and provide real-time data analysis to the farmers, thanks to the cloud connection and smartphone application. 📱#AI #artificialintelligence #IoT #InternetofThings #startup #sensors

Meet Bosch associate Yunge He. 👋Yunge had a passion for data throughout her studies, and following graduation in 2019, she joined Bosch as a data project manager. Her supervisor encouraged her to register in our data engineering training program after learning about her goal to work as a data engineer. 📈At Bosch, we offer support for professional and personal development courses where Yunge was able to train two days a week in addition to her job. She was able to learn about the practical aspect of data science by taking advantage of our in-house expertise. "Without the training, I would not be where I am today," says Yunge, who has been working as a data lake development engineer and REDLake product consultant at Bosch in Suzhou, China, since 2021. #data #dataengineer #dataanalytics #professionaldevelopment #personaldevelopment

🚘🚍🚶🚴 From cars and busses to pedestrians and cyclists: Keeping the overview in complex inner-city traffic requires a lot of concentration. This is especially true for tram drivers, who are exposed to these situations over long periods of time. 🚋To support them, we've developed a collision warning system. Consisting of a multipurpose camera, a radar sensor, and a control unit, the system monitors the track ahead and any possible obstacles in front of the vehicle in real time. If it detects a potential collision, it sends a warning to the driver, who can react accordingly. Should the driver respond too late or not at all, the collision warning system can also initiate automatic braking. Our system is already being used in more than 550 trams in 19 cities across Europe and will also be introduced in Australia on the Parramatta Light Rail network. 🌏#futuremobility #mobility #citytraffic #technology #driverassistance

🧗 What do mountain climbing and artificial intelligence (AI) research have in common? Bosch associate Jonathan Francis knows the answer. As climbing enthusiast and an AI researcher, Jonathan often discovers parallels between his hobby and career. His role as the lead climber is to find a safe and secure route and then place anchors and a rope for his other climbers. Likewise, with his AI research, Jonathan builds routes for AI applications in homes, factories, and automated transportation. 💻🦾Jonathan is working on giving machines "common sense" and the "skills" to interact with the real world. For instance, with Bosch automated driving technologies, sensors can be fully aware of the 360 degree driving environment second by second, helping automated driving become a reality. 🚘🌐 That is how Jonathan works on AI solutions that are safe, robust, and explainable, in line with the Bosch code of ethics for AI.#mountainclimbing #AI #artificialintelligence #research #selfdrivingvehicles #automateddriving #futuremobility

Do you plan to go cycling this weekend? 🚴 Cycling is not only fun and beneficial for physical and mental health, it is also one of the more environmentally friendly hobbies you can do alone, with friends, or with family. However, if you're living in a household that has many bicycles or don't have much space, you may find that they clutter up your rooms, hallways, or garages. We've got a guide to help you create a stylish and useful DIY wall-mounted bicycle rack to free up floor space while also showcasing your ride! Head to bosch-diy.com, search for "indoor bicycle rack" and get building. 🧰 For more home and garden projects check out @boschdiyandgarden.#cycling #diy #bike #mountainbike #sustainable #sustainability #ecofriendly

How will we get from A to B in the future? 🤔 From software-defined vehicles, to personalization, connectivity, and electrification – find out about the solutions we’re developing for the mobility of the future and more at this year’s Bosch ConnectedWorld, our leading conference on AIoT and digital transformation. Taking place as a new hybrid event on November 9 and 10, 2022, you can get your freemium or premium ticket on bosch-connected-world.com and join either in Berlin, Germany, or online from anywhere in the world. 🌍#BCW22 #AI #artificialintelligence #IoT #InternetofThings #digitaltransformation #connectivity #futuremobility #mobility #automateddriving #electromobility

Travel back in time: Mobility and mode of transportation have always been fascinating subjects for society. Railroads and automobiles paved the way toward mobility for the masses. 🚆🚘 Did you know that in addition to our famous magneto ignition system for motor vehicles, we also launched products in the first two decades of the 20th century that made driving safer and more comfortable? These included for example lights and windshield wipers. Today, we're working on shaping a new era of mobility which is safe, but also sustainable and exciting. To this end, we're developing solutions for personalized, automated, connected, and electrified vehicles. #futuremobility #automateddriving #mobility #connectivity #milestones #electricvehicles

🚘💥 When an accident happens, every second counts – but what if you're in the situation that you cannot call for help by yourself? Some ten years ago, we launched our emergency call service, also known as "eCall", for exactly these cases. Integrated into the vehicle's infotainment module, the emergency call system establishes a voice connection to an emergency call point to request rapid assistance in the event of an accident – either automatically or at the push of a button. From being available in nine countries and six languages back in 2012, the service is now used in more than 50 countries, more than 20 languages, and fitted in around 27 million cars from over 15 manufacturers. 🌍 And we're continuously working on further developing our eCall: It can, for example, now be integrated into fleet vehicle apps thanks to smartphone-based collision detection. 📱#ecall #emergencycall #roadsafety #roadsafetyawareness #mobility #rescueservices

🏍️ Over 80,000 people attended World Ducati Week at the Misano World Circuit in Italy last week. @boschitalia_official showcased our motorcycle technologies on the latest @Ducati models on track and off-road circuits during the event. Motorcycle enthusiasts could learn about our radar-based assistance systems (ARAS) and test solutions such as our motorcycle stability control (MSC).The MSC continuously monitors and analyzes data from numerous sensors to improve safety and stability in various riding situations. For example, by analyzing the difference in speed between the front and back wheels and the current dynamic state of the vehicle, the system assists with braking in curves due to the lean and pitch angle-dependent brake control. This improves braking performance and riding stability, particularly around bends.#WDW2022 #worldducatiweek #mobility #motorcycle #safety #roadsafety

🏳️‍🌈🙌 Proud #LikeABosch: Over 150 associates took part in the Christopher Street Day (CSD) parade in Stuttgart, Germany, last Saturday. Thanks to the efforts of our internal LGBT*IQ associate network "b:proud", our 40-ton truck returned to carry loud and proud associates. 🌈❤️ Bosch has been a sponsor of CSD in Stuttgart since 2015. But also throughout the year, we want to foster openness and diversity, for example, with our internal diversity week and workshops for our associates.#diversity #LGBTIQ #csd #christopherstreetday #csdstuttgart #pride #pride22 #inclusion #equity #equality

Have you ever had a cold shower because of an unexpected boiler issue? ❄️😱 In the latest episode of our “From KNOW-HOW to WOW” podcast, you can find out how so-called “Heatlytics”, a mixture of heat and data analytics in our HomeCom Pro solution, can help to improve efficiency and fix potential problems in heating systems.Our podcast hosts are joined by Bosch data scientist Alexandre Chambel and HomeCom Pro product owner Christoph Bauerdick to discuss this hot topic. With “Heatlytics”, appliance data is collected, processed, and analyzed to extract insights, such as a problem with your heating and hot water, and you can also monitor usage. 🔧📈 Listen to this episode and more on podcast platforms such as Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, and Spotify. Simply search for "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" and get ready to be wowed. 🎧😎#podcast #energy #heating #smarthome #connectedhome #data #analytics

For her, the participation of Bosch associates in Christopher Street Day (CSD) parades is also a great way to show that embracing diversity is a key part of our company culture.Why not try out our question game yourself? 🏙️🚴‍♀️ Do you cycle for your commute? Or is a bike your favorite way to get around the city in your free time? Then you will know that changing road surfaces and quickly slowing down for pedestrian crossings or traffic lights are common occurrences.The new @boschebikesystems ABS Touring mode is ideal for city cycling as it ensures better braking on any surface. Whether riding on firm asphalt or slippery gravel paths, the eBike ABS makes braking more stable, even when stopping sharply. The rider can confidently apply both brakes simultaneously without the front wheel locking and tires skidding on the road.#ebike #emobility #cycling #citycycling #commuterbike #bikes #electricbike #ebikestagram

🚵‍♂‍ Whether you're a beginner or an experienced mountain biker, good braking is essential for a safe and fun ride on challenging trails. @boschebikesystems has worked with professional eMountain bike athletes in developing our new ABS Trail application to meet the requirements and needs of sporty riders.In challenging sections like stony passages or areas with exposed roots, it allows riders to remain in control as the ABS automatically adjusts the front wheel brake pressure to effectively match the surface. The ABS also reliably controls the braking force, which helps optimize the transfer of body weight. As a result, fewer braking maneuvers involving shifting weight to the rear are required. This enables riders to refine their technique, improve their performance, and enjoy a safer ride. 🏅🚴#ebike #emtb #emobility #cycling #mountainbiking #bikes #electricbike #ebikestagram

🏙️🚴‍♀️ Sustainable and safe mobility is becoming increasingly important, especially in cities. At last week's @eurobike_show trade fair, @boschebikesystems presented new products and features for our eBike smart system. Our new eBike ABS is part of it and plays a key role in safer braking for all eBike categories on different surfaces thanks to its different ABS modes. One such category is the eCargo bike. Often used to transport children or shopping, carrying full loads places enormous demands on the brake system. Even when fully loaded, the ABS Cargo function provides faster, safer, and more accurate braking. The ABS adapts the braking force to the surface to find the optimum balance between deceleration and stability, preventing the front wheel from locking, shortening the braking distance, and reducing the risk of having an accident.#eurobikeshow #eurobike2022 #cargobike #cargobikes #ebike #emobility #technology #connectivity #cycling #bikes #electricbike #ebikestagram

👋 Associate Alfons Müller is a member of our internal "b:proud" employee network, and as a part of that network, he wants to share all of the positive experiences he has gained over the years at Bosch and encourage LGBT*IQ associates. 🏳️‍🌈 To take an active stand in the search for greater tolerance concerning sexual orientation, Alfons works with other associates in the "b:proud" network to help to raise awareness of the LGBT*IQ community at Bosch. They do so by offering associates support and encouragement in a variety of ways - from opportunities to share thoughts and ideas, to local and international events. 🌈🌎#pride #pride22 #lgbtiq #diversity #inclusion #equity #equality

👂👀 🚘 Technology invented for a safe life: In assisted and automated driving, the car needs to know what is going on around it at all times in order to reliably detect and react to objects and people. And cameras, radar, ultrasonic and lidar sensors enable it to do so! They are the eyes and ears of an automated car and supply all the information it needs to perceive its surroundings. As with all electronic systems, powerful semiconductors are at the heart of these technologies. With the 3 billion euros investment in microelectronics we announced yesterday at the #BoschTechDay, we also want to utilize the potential for innovation in the area of automated driving. One example: We want to enhance systems-on-a-chip, such as the radar sensors a vehicle uses to perform 360-degree scans of its surroundings, by making them smaller and smarter. #semiconductors #selfdrivingcar #selfdrivingvehicles #automateddriving #roadsafety #futuremobility

Welcome back to Europe's most advanced wafer fab! 🏭🌐Last year, we opened our wafer fab in Dresden, Germany, where we have been producing semiconductor chips on 300-millimeter wafers – with the first ones having been installed in our Biturbo cordless screwdrivers. Watch the video for a look inside our fully connected and intelligent AIoT factory! From consumer goods to mobility – the demand for semiconductors is growing continuously in various areas. To gear up for it, we'll be investing another 3 billion euros by 2026 in our semiconductor division. With this, we are planning on constructing two new development centers at our German wafer fabs as well as the increase of clean-room space in our fab in Dresden. Above all, this investment will open up new areas of innovation for developing technology that makes life safer, more connected, and sustainable. #BoschTechDay #siliconsaxony #waferfab #factoryofthefuture #internetofthings #IoT #AI #artificialintelligence #AIoT #semiconductors #automatedmanufacturing #manufacturing

Let's talk about pride! 🌈💬What does pride mean to you? Why is diversity at work important? How do we foster diversity in a global organization? 🏳️‍🌈 We want to create a workplace environment where everyone can express their true self – that's why, for example, some of our associates act as trusted advisors for peers to help support them in different areas.Alfons Müller (pictured in the center of this image wearing blue) is one such advisor. Alfons works as global website manager at Bosch Power Tools, and his commitment to the internal LGBT*IQ network, "b:proud," gives him a deep insight into diversity at Bosch. Being part of the "b:proud" network means he can help to support his colleagues in their everyday working lives: "I want to show my colleagues who are facing difficult situations and circumstances that they are not alone, and that support is always available – from the company, from allies, and from other members of queer marginalized groups."#pride #pride22 #lgbtiq #diversity #inclusion #equity #equality

What are the characteristics of a smart campus? 🤓🌐🏢 Our smart Spark.NXT campus, the new @bosch.india headquarters in Bengaluru, was inaugurated last week during the celebrations of 100 years of Bosch in India. It will provide inspiring working conditions for up to 10,000 Bosch associates who focus on developing user-centric innovations for a better quality of life. Therefore, the campus features a variety of smart, secure, and sustainable solutions. Here are a few highlights: 🔋💧 Our AIoT-powered analytics platform offers smart energy and water management to increase sustainability and resource efficiency. 💨🍃 There is a smart assistant developed to improve employee comfort while lowering the carbon footprint by optimizing heating, ventilating, and air-conditioning operations. 🧘🍃 The campus is using our ambient air quality monitoring solution to continuously monitor important noise and air pollutants. 🚘💆 Our smart parking solution provides a seamless parking experience, making the task easier, faster, and more sustainable by saving fuel and reducing CO2. #SparkNXTCampus #smartbuilding #smartsolutions #smarttechnology #sustainable #saveenergy #energyefficiency #IoT #AI #AIoT

🚘🅿️ Mariana Eichel has traveled the world while working for Bosch, and has encountered one continuous problem: parking. "Parking is a hassle, time-consuming, sometimes unsafe, and is responsible for a third of traffic congestion," says Mariana.As a project manager and technical lead for automated valet parking @boschusa, she recently held a demonstration of the first fully automated infrastructure-based driverless parking system in Los Angeles, U.S. The car park uses our intelligent infrastructure to monitor the driving corridor and its surroundings with sensors. This gives the vehicle the information to autonomously drive up and down ramps and change levels within the car park to get to its parking space. The system helps reduce the hassle of finding a parking space in a crowded car park and also parks the vehicle automatically once the space has been located, making it convenient and helping drivers to save time.#automateddriving #automatedparking #mobility #automotive #automation #safety

Imagine being able to remove odors and bacteria easily and on the go, without needing to wash your clothes. 👗😊 In the latest episode of our "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" podcast, we talk about how our FreshUp device uses plasma technology to remove odors from fabrics simply by brushing over them.Plasma occurs naturally in the universe. For example, in the stars and sun, and lightning bolts. 🌩️ During the show, Tobias Wende, a Bosch electronic system engineer, talks about how they were able to incorporate plasma technology, which releases active plasma particles to dissolve simple odor molecules, into a device the size of a glasses case. Listen to this electrifying episode and more on podcast platforms like Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, and Spotify. Simply search for "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" and get ready to be wowed. 🎧😎#podcast #gadget #cleaningtools #hometech #hometechnology #hometechnologies

Meet Alfons Müller, who works as global website manager at Bosch Power Tools. He moved from Germany to the U.S. on a six-month short-term assignment that changed his life forever: Not only did he fall in love with the country and its people, but he also met his now-husband, Robby. 🏳️‍🌈🙌 When the assignment was over, Alfons realized he wanted to live in the U.S. with his partner. Despite numerous challenges and delays, Alfons and our human resources department refused to give up. After a year and a half, he obtained his work permit and visa and was finally able to start his life with Robby in the U.S. 🌈❤️ #pride #LikeABosch #pride22 #pridemonth #lgbtiq #diversity #equality #inclusion #equity

Welcome back to the "Bosch Boxberg Klassik"! 🚘🤩Last weekend, we welcomed more than 300 participants with 150 classic cars for the 21st classic car rally "Bosch Boxberg Klassik". After starting in Stuttgart, Germany, on Friday, the at least 30-year-old cars and their owners made their way along a picturesque route via Abstatt to our proving ground in Boxberg. On a variety of tracks at our proving ground, where usually new or improved vehicle systems are put to the test, a range of different time trials for the classic vehicles were provided – including driving on our high-speed oval. Watch the video for some impressions from the event! 🙌 #boschboxbergklassik #historiccars #classiccars #classiccarshow #provingground #testtrack

💡 Many people are aware of the energy-saving benefits of using LED lighting in their homes. As part of a sustainable urban development program, the @cityofontario in California, U.S., is utilizing LED lighting on a big scale: Our subsidiary Climatec installed about 13,000 new LED streetlights across the city.🌇 By upgrading the lighting for the facilities and streets, the city's energy usage can be reduced by up to 80 percent. For effective energy management across the lighting network, the LED lights are linked to a smart system and can be monitored and controlled individually. 🍃🌎#sustainability #ecofriendly #ledlights #streetlight #smartlighting #smarttechnology #smartcity

"For me, diversity can spring to life in a company when all employees are integrated without bias or value judgements," says Ram Krishnasamy, Agile Organizational Developer and Business Agility Coach at Bosch. Ram is a member of our internal network "b:proud". The goal of the associate community is to increase the visibility of the LGBT*IQ community and to take a more active stand for greater tolerance in relation to sexual orientation. 🤝🌈The activities of the "b:proud" network include organizing the participation in Christopher Street Day (CSD) parades in various cities, for example in Stuttgart, Germany, at the end of July. For Ram, taking part in CSD events sends a clear signal "for open-mindedness, progress, and support". 🏳️‍🌈🙌 This goes hand in hand with our corporate culture which is based on diversity, equity, and inclusion. #pride #LikeABosch #christopherstreetday #csd2022 #pride22 #pridemonth #diversity #lgbtiq

🚘🔋 Fully charged: The @CityOfOntario, California, U.S., has new electric vehicle charging stations to help make it easier for drivers to get around more sustainably.Faced with record heat waves, water shortages, and wildfires, California is starting to feel the strain. In response, some of the state’s major energy consumers — cities with a heavy carbon footprint — are joining the battle to fight climate change, with Ontario investing 35 million dollars on energy infrastructure renewal.The electric charging stations were installed by our subsidiary Climatec, who advise businesses and municipalities on how to become more eco-friendly. They also supported with the installation of new smart equipment in 26 public facilities around Ontario. This investment is allowing the city to lead the way in climate change mitigation and is expected to save more than 75 million dollars over the lifetime of the new equipment.🍃🌎#electricvehicles #chargingstations #renewableenergy #sustainability #smartcity

🍃🌇 Sustainable cities: By using smart, sustainable technology the @CityofOntario in California, U.S., is tackling climate change through sustainable urban development. Our subsidiary Climatec supported the city in reducing greenhouse gas emissions by 10,000 tons a year. Michael Johnson, Ontario’s director of municipal services, is rightly proud of the achievements: “We only have one planet. All we can do is take care of it”. 🌎There are many sustainable solutions which are spread all across the city. Vehicles are now parked under massive solar panels at the Convention Center, allowing the building to cover up to 69 percent of its electrical needs through solar power, while public charging points for electric vehicles and new LED streetlights have been distributed across the city. On the Westwind Community Center swimming pool roof, a new solar-thermal heating system was installed, resulting in yearly natural gas savings of up to 50 percent. ☀️🏊‍♀️What type of sustainable technology would be most beneficial to your city? Let us know in the comments 👇#smartcity #smarttechnology #sustainability #saveenergy #climatechange #IoT #citiesofinstagram

Working together for more sustainability: Have you ever taken part in an organized cleanup at a park, beach, canal, or similar? 🤔Some 100 Bosch associates from our internal network "Young Bosch Benelux" can now say that they have! They recently gathered in Amsterdam, Netherlands, for a day, with the goal of actively contributing to creating a better world by retrieving as much floating plastic and waste as possible from the city's canals. 🍃Supported by @boschebikesystems' partner @plasticwhale, a social enterprise offering plastic fishing trips, our associates went on eleven boats, made from recycled materials, to collect floating plastic waste in the canals using nets. Transported to the processing facilities using Bosch ePowered cargo bikes, the waste will then be recycled and turned into furniture and boats, which can be used for even more plastic fishing trips. 🙌Watch the video for some impressions from the day!#cleanup #plasticfishing #plasticwaste #plasticrecycling #recycling #sustainability

🙌🌈 As we watch our colleagues in Brazil @bosch_carreiras kick off pride season by raising rainbow flags, we look forward to celebrating with associates at Bosch locations around the world! 🏳️‍🌈 There are many activities planned by our internal LGBT*IQ networks - from virtual pride events to participating in Christopher Street Day parades.Keep an eye out in the coming weeks as we will be sharing stories from Bosch associates talking about diversity in the workplace and how Bosch supported them and their freedom to be themselves.#pride #pride22 #pridemonth #diversity #lgbtq

Have you ever left your home and wondered if the heating or lights were turned off? Or maybe unsure if the doors and windows are closed? 😱In BMW vehicles featuring Apple CarPlay, Amazon Alexa Car, or Android Auto, a voice assistant of choice can now be used to control and monitor connected Bosch Smart Home products while on the road. 🏡🤝🚘Check out the video to see how simple it is to activate pre-set scenarios such as “leaving home” by voice assistant, which will switch off all lights and heating. Not only that, it can also check the status of your home security smart devices such as your door and window contacts.#BMW #bmwsmartcar #smarthome #smartliving #voiceassistant #sustainability #saveenergy #IoT #InternetOfThings

How can artificial intelligence help emergency services respond quickly to forest fires? 🌲🔥Placed deep in the forest, the Silvanet system developed by environmental start-up Dryad, utilizes our intelligent AI gas sensor which acts as a digital nose. Just 3 by 3 mm in size, the sensor detects the gases generated during the early stages of a fire. As part of the system, they also collect data which serves to continuously train the environmental sensors using artificial intelligence so they can detect and analyze gases with even greater accuracy. 📈If fire gases are detected, the system sends a cloud-based notification to emergency services, assisting firefighters like Ricky in reacting quickly to fires and putting them out before they spread and cause irreversible damage. 👨‍🚒🚒 #forestsofinstagram #firefighting #forestfires #climatechange #AI #IoT #InternetOfThings #sensortechonology #sensors

👨‍🚒🚨 Meet Ricky, a firefighter in California, U.S. Ricky understands the impact wildfires can have on people, animals, and the environment. When it comes to fighting fires he believes that time is crucial and is convinced that a “fire alarm” for forests could help firefighters like him to respond faster. 🔥🌲🚒💨Dryad, an environmental start-up, created this “fire alarm” by utilizing our intelligent AI gas sensor: The Silvanet system can detect fires ultra-early and alert emergency services or firefighters quickly, who can act before the fire spreads and causes extensive damage.#firefighting #forestfires #climatechange #AI #sensortechnology #IoT #InternetOfThings

Did you know that forest fires are responsible for up to 20% of annual global carbon emissions? 🔥🌲Using intelligent sensor technology, environmental start-up Dryad developed the Silvanet system to protect forests by alerting firefighters like Ricky, enabling them to respond swiftly. Our AI gas sensors used in the system detect carbon monoxide, hydrogen, and other gases – even during the early smoldering stage of a fire.As the world's climate continues to get warmer and drier, up to 10 million hectares of forests are destroyed by wildfires in the U.S. alone every year, posing a threat to humans, wildlife, and the environment. By 2030, Dryad's goal is to protect 1.4 million hectares of forest from fires, thereby preventing 600 million tons of carbon emissions. 🌎🍃#WorldEnvironmentDay #OnlyOneEarth #forestfires #climatechange #AI #artificialintelligence #InternetofThings #IoT #sensortechnology #sensor

June 3 is #WorldBicycleDay. 🚴‍♀️🚴‍♂️eBiking is a fun and sustainable mode of transportation, but can it help improve fitness? Similar to a traditional bicycle, the more you pedal, the more energy you expend – and thanks to the drive unit support, you can also ride an eBike further and for longer than a traditional bicycle. 🙌Tracking your performance is important, whether you're riding for leisure, preparing for a race, aiming to beat your personal best, or getting ready for a cycling vacation. 🚵‍♀️ With our Nyon on-board computer and the eBike Connect app, you can set your personal fitness goals to track your progress or check if you've just beaten your personal best! Track metrics like calorie consumption, distance, and elevation using the on-screen display, while keeping an eye on your performance at all times. For added convenience, using the eBike Connect app you can also save fitness data in the Apple Health and Google Fit health apps. To learn more about our eBike drive units, visit @boschebikesystems. #ebike #emobility #technology #connectivity #cycling #bikes #electricbike #ebikestagram

Paving the way with technology in the fight against climate change: Did you know that the industrial sector accounts for around one-fifth of global CO2 emissions? At Bosch, we are convinced that the industry must and can play a crucial role in environmental and climate action. 🏭🍃One of the locations where we’re demonstrating what is already possible today when it comes to green factories is our Industry 4.0 lead plant in Homburg, Germany. By using our Energy Platform and Industry 4.0 software, we were able to improve the energy efficiency in the plant and cut energy requirements by over 40% per manufactured product. Additionally, a solution for compressing hydrogen for hydrogen filling stations developed by @boschrexroth_global and @maximator.hydrogen is to be trialed here. Compared with the alternatives available in the market, the new, container-based compressors have the potential to reduce filling-station operators’ total costs of ownership. Thereby, the solution is helping to make the use of green hydrogen economical – in passenger cars, commercial vehicles, buses, and trains. 🚘🚛🚌🚆#industry40 #connectedindustry #HM22 #hanoverfair #hannovermesse #manufacturing #industrialtechnology #connectivity #sustainability

What do the components of a car have in common with a jazz band? 🚘🎷🤔 One of the most common challenges for jazz bands and car manufacturers alike is somehow getting each component working together in harmony. A cross-divisional team around two Bosch system engineers, Erik Goerres and Dieter Schwarzmann, want to make car manufacturers’ lives easier for future electric vehicles. Find out how in the latest episode of our "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" podcast.To understand the challenges and improve component integration, Erik and Dieter decided to take the learning-by-doing approach and constructed their own research-only prototype car – the "Rolling Chassis". This helped them for example to develop the "Advanced Driving Module", a package solution with all the Bosch components needed to make an electric car move. Let’s get this episode rolling!Listen to this episode and more on podcast platforms like Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, and Spotify. Simply search for "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" and get ready to be wowed. 🎧😎#podcast #mobility #electricvehicle #electricmobility #electricdrive #manufacturing

Winning is everything for world champion smartphone racing star Florian "oNio" Roschu. But what's under the hood of his smartphone that enables him to control his digital race car with the necessary precision to win? 🏆🏁 It's our MEMS sensors! The tiny microelectromechanical systems can convert the tilting movements of smartphones into precise controls and commands. In the smartphone racing game "Asphalt 9", nearly all players choose the control option that switches off additional aids, meaning the car is controlled by tilting the phone sideways only. "The tilt control is more difficult to master, but you can steer much more precisely and smoothly with it," Florian explains. 📱Are you using tilt control while playing car racing games on your smartphone? 🤔 Let us know in the comments!#asphalt9 #asphalt9legends #eracing #smartphones #sensortechnology #sensors

🏁🏎️ Step inside the world of smartphone gaming: Pro gamer Florian Roschu is the world champion in the popular mobile car racing game "Asphalt 9", which takes players on engine-roaring, tire-squealing digital racetracks across the globe. Known in the game as "oNio", Florian says his formula for success is down to time and patience. "You should study the game mechanics intensively, know the tracks and shortcuts well, and master the right controls," he explains. Can you guess which Bosch product is hidden inside many smartphones, enabling Florian to control the movement of his digital race car precisely? Watch the video to find out! #asphalt9 #asphalt9legends #eracing #smartphones #sensortechnology #sensors

🏎️📱 Fancy a race? In many smartphone racing games, victory is decided in the margins – and precision is key. In "Asphalt 9" for example, players like Florian "oNio" Roschu use special tilt controls to make precise movements with their cars to race smoothly and quickly. Did you know that our tiny microelectromechanical systems, or MEMS sensors for short, enable extreme precision? They scan a smartphone's rotation rate 6,000 times per second, which allows them to generate a new measured value every 0.16 milliseconds. And even when the races get hot, the sensors stay cool. This ensures that the control remains stable, even with large temperature fluctuations due to the hardware working away in the smartphone. #asphalt9 #asphalt9legends #smartphones #eracing #sensors #sensortechnology

🚴⚡ New record: Professional BMX athlete @Jedmildon successfully jumped on a Bosch ePowered bike for a distance of 24.37 meters. That's around the length of three London buses or an average blue whale! 😉We're delighted to have supported Jed all the way from the planning to the ramp build to the jump itself: First, the ideal location that could accommodate a 300-meter-long run-in to the take-off and landing area was determined using our precision laser measuring tools. Jed then used our professional power tools to build the 13-meter-long and 3.5-meter-high take-off ramp, the measuring tools also helped ensure that the run was perfectly aligned and precise. He went on to perform the incredible leap on a Bosch ePowered bike.It's understood that this is the longest horizontal distance ever jumped on an eBike and formal ratification of an official world record has been requested.Visit @Boschebikesystems.anz to find out more about our eBike drive systems, and @boschtoolsanz for more about our professional power tools.#ebike #electricbike #ebikestagram #boschprofessional #boschtools #powertools #stunt

🌏🤝 Do you work in a global team and collaborate a lot with colleagues in different countries? At Bosch, people from more than 150 different nations work together at our over 400 locations worldwide – forming a truly global and diverse team. For us, diversity is reflected in the uniqueness of our associates, their personalities, experiences, and perspectives – and is also an integral part of our corporate strategy. By including everyone and ensuring equal opportunities, we unleash our full potential. 💪 Let's raise our glasses (and coffee cups 😉) to celebrate diversity together not only on the @unitednations’ #DiversityDay but all year round! 🥂☕#wearebosch #diversity #diversityandinclusion #diversitymatters #inclusion #inclusionmatters

What an electric racing spectacle it was last weekend at the @fiaformulae #BerlinEPrix! 🏎️⚡ As the next race at the beginning of June in Jakarta, Indonesia, is still a little while away, we want to give you a glimpse behind the scenes of the all-electric racing series.Did you know that the Julius Baer Pole Position Trophy, which is handed to the driver of the fastest lap in qualifying, is 3D printed and consists of industrial plastic, reinforced with long glass fibers, that is 100 percent recyclable? It is designed and printed by Bosch Industrial Additive Manufacturing, a start-up fostered by "grow platform", our Bosch internal incubator for lean start-ups and home of Bosch intrapreneurs. While the trophy is proof of what is possible today in the manufacturing of plastic parts when modern 3D printing methods and classic injection molding are successfully combined, it also shows the potential when it comes to the design. Every trophy is individualized with the current race location, and it also features a Formula E race car chassis in the bionic design – can you spot it? 🤔 For more about our involvement in motorsport, check out: @boschmotorsport.#ABBFormulaE #formulae #motorsport #racing #electromobility

Imagine having a home on wheels that allows you to explore and discover new places to live and work. 🚐 Since 2019, Laura Krüger and André Weigelt have been living in their motorhome, @oskartheexplorer, with their dog Luna.  Their van is their home, office, and mode of transport, so security is very important to them. 🔒Thankfully, spexor, our all-in-one portable security assistant, helps keep their home and belongings safe by monitoring for any break-ins or other safety hazards, and alerts them via the app if anything unexpected happens. This means that they can continue to enjoy their adventures feeling safe and secure. 🛣️#vanlife #traveling #lifeontheroad #sensors #technology #IoT #security #smarthome #smarthometechnology

Ramping up to something big: Watch the video to find out what we have planned in New Zealand this week. A little hint: Professional BMX athlete @jedmildon is up to something record-breaking, so make sure to follow along! 😉💪 #ebike #powertools #worldrecordattempt The stunts displayed in this video are performed by a professional in a controlled environment. Do not attempt to duplicate, re-create, or perform the same or similar stunts at home, as personal injury or property damage may result.

Wouldn't it be nice to have an all-in-one security solution to help look after you and your belongings? Meet spexor, our portable assistant. It can provide security in a variety of places – at home, in your garage, a hotel room, or your motorhome. 🚐 It uses intelligent sensors to monitor the environment around it, and detect potential risks such as attempted break-ins, elevated temperatures, and hazardous substances in the air – like a high pollen count or fire gases.If the device identifies any of those risks, an LED light signal or a warning sound is generated. When you're away from your home or vehicle, spexor will alert you via a push notification on the spexor app, giving you peace of mind wherever you are. 📱#homesecurity #security #sensors #technology #IoT #smarttechnology #smarthome #security

Have you ever dreamed of living a life on the open road? Meet Laura Krüger, André Weigelt, and their dog Luna. Together they explore parts of the world while living and working in their self-converted motorhome @oskartheexplorer. 👫🐕Watch the video to see how spexor, our portable all-in-one security assistant, helps keep them safe and their home secure by acting as an alarm system, monitoring the air quality and temperature, and more. 🗺️🚐#traveling #vanlife #lifeontheroad #sensors #technology #IoT #security #smarthometechnology

🍃🚛 Driving the transition to alternative mobility: One of the paths we follow at Bosch when it comes to developing sustainable mobility is electromobility based on fuel cells. With mobile fuel cells, we want to facilitate the climate-neutral shipping of goods and commodities, initially by truck.And we're working toward this: This year, we will start the series production of fuel cell powertrains for trucks and once again increase our investment in mobile fuel cells – to almost 1 billion euros between 2021 and 2024. In China, the first trucks with our fuel cell power module are already on the road. Our scalable fuel cell power module is a fuel cell system that generates electricity from hydrogen in vehicles. To advance the hydrogen production in Europe, we are entering the components business for hydrogen electrolysis with an investment of nearly 500 million euros by 2030. Here, we will be supplying the stack – the core of the hydrogen electrolysis system – which combines with power electronics, sensors, and a control unit to create a smart module. The stacks for hydrogen generation are expected to go into production as early as 2025. #BoschAPC #fuelcell #hydrogen #sustainability #sustainablemobility #climateneutrality
