The records included for example driving the distance of 1 km, after a flying start, in 19.061 seconds at a top speed of 188.86 kph. 🏎️⚡ The car's electric drive system consisted mainly of Bosch components: We supplied both the two DC electric motors with a combined 88 kW (120 hp) and the power electronics.#electromobility #electricdrive #electricvehicle #emobility #cars #carsofinstagram #automotive #automotivetechnology #history #throwback

🏭🌐 Machines that think for themselves, maintenance from a distance of 9,000 kilometers, smart glasses with built-in cameras: The Dresden wafer fab is our first AIoT factory, combining artificial intelligence (AI) and the Internet of Things (IoT) in the manufacturing process.Sarah Fischbach is a data scientist who, along with her highly skilled colleagues, ensures that the wafer production in Dresden, Germany, is continuously optimized.Thanks to the data generated by the factory's systems, sensors, and products and the self-optimizing algorithms, she can analyze the operations in real time without disrupting sensitive manufacturing processes. "We trust technology. But the critical decisions are always made by humans," says Sarah.#waferfab #factory #manufacturing #semiconductor #technology #automotiveelectronics #automateddriving #artificialintelligence #AI #internetofthings #IoT

Take a look inside our factory of the future! ➡️🏭🌐Our smart factory in Dresden, Germany, is one of the most advanced wafer fabs in the world. It uses state-of-the-art technology to create a highly automated manufacturing process. The microchips produced in this factory are destined for our products in the domain of automated driving and will enable connectivity in other products, too. #waferfab #factory #manufacturing #semiconductor #technology #automotiveelectronics #automateddriving #artificialintelligence #AI #internetofthings #IoT

Did you know that the usual number of airborne particles is some 100,000 particles per cubic foot of air? In the clean room of our semiconductor fab in Dresden, Germany, this is unacceptable. Here, a cubic foot of air – or around 28 liters – may contain no more than one particle weighing just half a microgram. That’s equivalent to a single cherry stone floating in a lake consisting of some 360 million bathtubs of water! 💧🍒Why? Because at our state-of-the-art factory in Dresden we're producing wafers. Just one millimeter thick, they are silicon disks with a diameter of 300 millimeters on which microchips are built on. One speck of dust can damage the wafer’s quality, that's why dust must be kept out. ❌To ensure cleanliness, anyone wanting to enter the clean room has to put on a special suit and step into an automated air shower which blasts away every bit of dust. 🚿#factory #factoryofthefuture #semiconductors #microchips #technology #innovation #cleanroom #artificialintelligence #AI #internetofthings #IoT #AIoT

"I spy with my little eye..." 👓👀Smart eyewear played an important role in getting our new semi-conductor plant in Dresden, Germany, up and running. The pandemic basically made it impossible to travel – but thanks to Augmented Reality and data glasses, experts were able to operate the facilities remotely. An associate on-site puts on a pair of data glasses and uses them to let the expert see the machine for themselves. The specialist is shown the field of vision of the glasses on a screen and can give instructions to their colleague. Watch the video to explore how smart glasses can change our working world – and stay tuned for more information about our state-of-the-art wafer fab in Dresden following this week!#ar #augmentedreality #smartglasses #semiconductors #remoteworking #microchips

🍰 Trusting technology for a stress-free time in the kitchen: Follow passionate food YouTuber @sallyswelt's lead and bake with artificial intelligence (AI). Sally trusts our Bosch Series 8 oven with built-in artificial intelligence to bake her signature lemon tart to perfection. All she has to do is prepare the pastry, put it in the oven, and select the appropriate baking program. Using sensor data, the AI algorithm calculates the remaining baking time – alerting her when the tart is ready. 🌐 The AI algorithm learns from the baking processes in the oven – and from those in the ovens of other users who connected their oven to the Bosch Home Connect server and consented to anonymized data communication. That's how the oven gets smarter over time, and the more frequently households use these smart ovens, the more accurate their predictions for baked, roasted, braised, and broiled dishes will be. For all of you who are now inspired to bake, whether using a smart or a traditional oven, swipe right for Sally’s delicious lemon tart recipe and the instructions. ➡️#AI #artificialintelligence #innovation #digitaltransformation #technology #cookingtechnology #cookingtechnology #cooking #cookingathome #baking

💡 A lambda probe! This type of sensor, which is also used to build catalytic converters for cars, measures the oxygen level in our Bosch Series 8 sensor oven constantly. Why? To determine how long the dish still needs! 🍲⏲️⬇️ This is how it works:Every dish that goes into a hot oven gives off moisture. The longer the baking or cooking time, the more moisture evaporates from the food and the higher the humidity in the oven. These levels drop as the moisture evaporating from the food displaces oxygen. Using the readings from the lambda probe, our oven's built-in artificial intelligence calculates the remaining baking time. It then sends the information directly to our Home Connect app. 📲That's how we're making cooking and baking easier and more convenient with the help of artificial intelligence. #AI #artificialintelligence #AIoT #IoT #internetofthings #innovation #digitaltransformation #technology #cookingtechnology #cooking #cookingathome #baking

The days of having to repeatedly open the oven door and poke the contents with a skewer to check consistency are finally over – thanks to our smart sensor oven with built-in artificial intelligence (AI)! 👩‍🍳⏲️Food YouTuber @SallysWelt has over 1.9 million subscribers on her channel and is testing one of our latest innovations: the Bosch Series 8 oven with PerfectBake sensor. The smart oven can not only adjust cooking and baking time automatically, but with a glance at our Home Connect app, Sally also has all the information she needs conveniently at hand. "Baking with the help of AI is just as much fun – there’s just a lot less stressful multitasking involved," she summarizes her experience.Intrigued? Stay tuned for more information about how our AI technology in the kitchen can help make your life easier by taking the stress out of cooking and baking!#AI #artificialintelligence #AIoT #IoT #internetofthings #innovation #digitaltransformation #technology #cookingtechnology #cooking #cookingathome #baking

🌐 There are some 339 million asthma sufferers worldwide. The Global Asthma Network estimates that the respiratory disease is one of the most frequent chronic health conditions.😮‍💨 With our "Vivatmo me" breath-gas analyzer, we offer asthmatics support. The device allows you to monitor yourself at home and to detect a worsening of your condition at an early stage. For many asthma sufferers, this is a crucial step toward dealing better with their disease and getting a grip on it. 🩺 By using what is known as FeNO or NO testing, "Vivatmo me" relies on a new examination method that determines the level of inflammation in your lungs. The findings can be documented in an app and shared with a doctor. #WorldAsthmaDay #WorldAsthmaMonth #globalasthmanetwork #asthma #respiratorydisease #lungdisease #defeatasthma

Express delivery! 🍼 🛵 Returning to work after being on maternity leave can be a challenge – not all employers can offer flexible schedules for working mothers or comfortable nursing rooms. We’ve made the return to work a little easier for some working mothers in Vietnam thanks to our unique breast milk delivery service.The breast milk is being picked up from the mother’s workplace and transported in special delivery boxes which are equipped with our MEMS sensors to help control motion, temperature, and humidity. Parents and carers can easily track the delivery on the app for a smooth handover at home. #sensors #sensortechnology #tech #innovation #workingparents #workingmom #parents #family

"Nee-naw", "pin-pon", "tatü-tata": How many different sirens from around the world do you recognize? 👂🚨🚔In the latest episode of our "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" podcast, it is all about the sound of sirens and how to equip cars with ears. Our hosts Melena and Geoff talked to Bosch researchers about the challenges they faced while trying to teach cars to recognize sirens on the road and distinguish them from other noises, alarms or music. It’s a noisy world out there! However, the pandemic gave us periods of quiet and the sound of the world changed – our guest from the @pandemicsilence Project will tell us all about that. Listen up and check it out! You can find this episode and more on podcast platforms such as Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, and Spotify! Simply search for "From KNOW-HOW to WOW" and get ready to be wowed. 😎#podcast #techpodcast #automateddriving #artificialintelligence #sirendetection #acousticsignal #soundsignal #machinelearning

🚀 On a big journey: Two of our BMI160 sensors are part of @nasa's Mars Rover Perseverance Mission. By collecting data on how fast and in which direction the Mars rover's helicopter Ingenuity is traveling, they are supporting its flight stability. The helicopter achieved the first powered, controlled flight on another planet ever – a historical milestone! 🍾 Image credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech#tech #sensors #sensortechnology #marsmission #ingenuityhelicopter #NASA

The future of energy generation, ramped up for mass production: From industrial environments to our private spheres, advances like the internet of things, big data, and more require a great deal of power – leading to a rising demand for electricity worldwide. ⚡🌍But how can this global appetite for electricity be satisfied in a sustainable, eco-friendly way? Our solution: the stationary solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC). An electrochemical reaction in the SOFC generates electricity and heat. By connecting several hundred of them, we're creating high-performance stacks which are the heart of the SOFC system.Powered by hydrogen from renewables, the SOFC system will be the key to saying farewell to fossil fuels and could be used to power for example commercial buildings, industrial parks, data centers, and modern urban neighborhoods.🏘️#BoschAPC #hydrogen #fuelcell #fuelcelltechnology #sustainability #sustainable #renewableenergy

Embracing change: "Bosch came through the first year of the coronavirus pandemic well," said Volkmar Denner, Bosch CEO, at today's annual press conference. Our way forward ⏩ AIoT, electrification, and green hydrogen:	🔋 In powertrain technology, electromobility is establishing itself as our core business. Overall, we have acquired orders worth over 20 billion euros by the end of 2020. We are making heavy upfront investments in this area – a further 700 million euros this year alone. 🌐 We are combining the internet of things (IoT) with artificial intelligence (AI) to generate future business and becoming a leading AIoT company. Connecting things leads to knowledge about how things are used. This lets us continuously improve our products, keep them up to date, and provide our customers with more benefits.	💧We are also focusing on the hydrogen megatrend. "Bosch is already H2-ready," Bosch CEO Denner said. Fuel cells convert hydrogen into electricity, and we are developing both stationary and mobile fuel-cell solutions. From 2021 to 2024, we want to invest over one billion euros in fuel-cell technology. The plan is to put 100 stationary fuel-cell plants into operation this year, for example to supply data centers or residential areas.#BoschAPC #AIoT #IoT #artificialintelligence #electromobility #emobility #fuelcell #hydrogen #sustainability

CO2 reduction at Bosch: We keep going! 🍃Now, that our more than 400 locations worldwide are officially climate-neutral, we are giving concrete shape to our plans for what is next. In expanding our climate action further, we want to take a close look at the carbon footprint of our products, purchased goods, and logistics processes. Here again, we have an ambitious target: we will reduce our indirect emissions by 15 percent by 2030.Isabelle Gola, Project Manager Sustainability at Bosch Power Tools, has been working on this challenge for quite some time now. She and her team are engaged in identifying the environmental impact of the Power Tools value chain and deriving measures from their analyses. One of these measures is the use of recycled and environmentally friendly materials in power tools and packaging. Stay tuned for more news on how we take action for the climate at our annual press conference on April 22! #BoschAPC#BoschAPC21 #annualpressconference #sustainability #climateneutral #CO2 #carbonneutral #indirectemissions #scope3 #recycling #ecodesign #environmentalprotection #circulareconomy

As the coronavirus pandemic represents a paradigm shift in our daily lives, it is now more important than ever to rely on technology you can trust. 🧪🔬🤍Vivalytic has been designed to be as easy and intuitive to use as possible, meaning that healthcare professionals like Marisol only require a brief training session. Its fast analyzer provides results in 39 minutes, making it one of the quickest PCR based SARS-CoV-2 tests in the world. PCR tests are considered the gold standard of test methods. The validation study showed that the Vivalytic SARS-CoV-2 test accurately detects 98 percent of positive cases and every negative case.#covidtesting #vivalytic #biotechnology #pcr #rapidtesting #diagnostics #covidsafe

Vivalytic provides a reliable test result for SARS-CoV-2 in 39 minutes, making it one of the world’s fastest PCR tests. ⏱️🧪The microchip inside the smartphone-sized cartridge works much like an ordinary laboratory, only the lab-on-a-chip is much smaller and fully automated. Vivalytic is able to run this test so quickly because its cartridge contains very little liquid. With a lot less liquid to heat and cool, it works much faster than the equipment in a normal lab. #covidtesting #vivalytic #biotechnology #pcr #rapidtesting #diagnostics #covidsafe

Due to the current situation, a negative coronavirus test is essential when you want to meet a friend or family member in a care home. Bosch’s Vivalytic rapid PCR testing technology for SARS-CoV-2 can deliver reliable results on-site in under 39 minutes. This means that visitors can spend more quality time with their loved ones. 👵👴🤍▶️ Watch the video to find out more about the benefits of our rapid coronavirus test! #covidtesting #vivalytic #biotechnology #pcr #rapidtesting #diagnostics #covidsafe

10 years of "Industry 4.0" – our APAS approves! 🤖🎂Did you know that in 2014, our automatic production assistant (APAS) was the world’s first robot to be cleared for working in close proximity with humans without the need for additional protective housing? This was not only a big step in the development of human-robot collaboration but also crucial for Industry 4.0. 🦾🏭🌐 As pioneers in the field of connected manufacturing, we've consistently pursued our idea of the factory of the future over the years. With the foundation we've laid, we're now looking to harness the power of different technologies and combine them.Our Balancing Energy Network for example, is an AI-based energy management system that employs intelligent software to control and optimize energy flows in factories. And while it was originally developed for manufacturing facilities, the software has the potential to help all types of larger building complexes reduce their environmental footprint, including hospitals, shopping malls, and sports arenas. 🍃#industry40 #connectedindustry #hanoverfair #hannovermesse #manufacturing #industrialtechnology #connectivity #IoT #internetofthings #AI #artificialintelligence #HM21 #sustainability

🏎️🔋⚡ Electrifying motorsports on the city streets: We’re into our third year as official global partner for the @fiaformulae World Championship and are looking forward to the third race of the season in Italy. By being an official global partner of the all-electric racing series and by joining forces with the @dragonracing_fe team, we continue to show that electromobility is not only more sustainable but also more exciting. Learn more about our technology for the fast track on the @boschmotorsport Instagram channel.#emobility #boschmotorsport #motorsport #wesetthepace #ABBFormulaE #racing #formulae

This old sewing machine knows the answer! 🧵😉Using his old family heirloom, Bosch associate Claus Lau explained the basic principles and benefits of connected manufacturing to his team. By equipping the sewing machine from the 1930s with sensors, it was possible to display essential information such as how long the belt lasts or if the needle is still usable on a screen. The perfect proof that analog machines can be retrofitted for Industry 4.0. 🤔 But what is Industry 4.0? Established as a term in 2011, it describes a smart factory with machines that are connected, communicate with each other, and organize themselves – with people at the center of it all, orchestrating more efficient, more flexible, and more customized production.🏭🌐 As one of Industry 4.0's founding fathers, we have been systematically leading factories – both our own and those of our customers – into this new industrial age since 2012.At this year's digital fair "Hannover Messe," we are presenting solutions that combine Industry 4.0 with other technologies, including open, 5G-enabled control technology and AI-based energy management for climate-neutral manufacturing. 🍃#industry40 #connectedindustry #hanoverfair #hannovermesse #manufacturing #industrialtechnology #connectivity #IoT #internetofthings #AI #artificialintelligence #HM21 #sustainability

April 7 each year is #WorldHealthDay! 🌍 At Bosch, we want to improve people's quality of life with technology "invented for life" and from the very beginning, the aspect of healthcare has been an important part of the company. 🏥 From an early age on, our company founder Robert Bosch had the wish to support a homeopathic hospital – and he put his idea into practice. The picture shows him inspecting the new technical equipment in the laboratory of the Robert Bosch Hospital a few weeks after its official opening in April 1940. Today, our successes with sensors, automation, connectivity, and artificial intelligence offer a solid foundation for our innovative healthcare solutions such as the coronavirus rapid test which we developed for our Vivalytic analysis device.#health #healthcare #technology #innovation #history #companyhistory

Love your wireless headphones? 🎧 Did you know that these tiny earbuds have a big obstacle to overcome?In order for always-on applications like gesture recognition or activity tracking to work, the earbuds rely heavily on precise data which generally comes with higher power consumption – draining the battery quickly. Additionally, the earbuds' battery has to be quite small as there is much less room for it compared to, for example, in a smartphone. 📱The solution? Our MEMS sensors. Small but mighty, they enable you for instance to conveniently control your music volume by double-tapping and they also keep track of your step count – all with low power consumption so you don’t have to worry about charging your earbuds quite so often. 😎#tech #sensors #MEMS #connectivity #IoT #outdoors #fitness #running #runningmotivation #runnersofinstagram #instarun #runners #runnersworld #fitnesslifestyle #healthy #lifestyle

#EarthHour started as a symbolic lights-out event in Sydney, Australia, and is now one of the world's largest grassroots movements for the environment. At Bosch, we are dedicated to do our part in protecting our planet by working toward our ambitious sustainability goals. 🍃All of our 400 locations worldwide have been carbon neutral since 2020. To reach this goal, we defined four levers, which we are using consistently: to increase energy efficiency, to expand the supply of renewable energy, to purchase more green electricity, and to offset unavoidable CO2 emissions with carbon credits.Since 2019, we were able to save 0.4 terawatt-hours of energy by making energy-efficiency improvements at our locations. By 2030, we are targeting 1.7 terawatt-hours. This corresponds to the annual electricity consumption of all private households in a city like Cologne, Germany, which has over one million inhabitants.Let's all work together toward a greener future! 🌍🍃#EarthHour #EarthHour2021 #Connect2Earth #climateaction #energyefficiency #savingenergy #sustainability #sustainable #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #csr #renewableenergy

🏆🏁 A milestone in the history of Bosch Motorsport: Exactly 120 years ago, on March 25, 1901, legendary Mercedes works driver Wilhelm Werner won the "Nice-Salon-Nice" race in a 35 hp Mercedes – equipped with a Bosch magneto ignition. Learn more about the history of @boschmotorsport and the Bosch magneto ignition in the history blog on our corporate website bosch.com.#historyfacts #boschhistory #motorsport #racing #boschmotorsport #MBClassic #tbt #throwback #throwbackthursday

"Quantum technology is pushing the boundaries of what is possible – in the domains of computing as well as sensors," says Bosch CEO Volkmar Denner. "Above all, the aim is to enhance the broad practical benefit of quantum effects." One application that is interesting for Bosch is the simulation of new materials, right down to their atomic structure – something that even today’s supercomputers cannot do. This could lead to a huge leap forward in the development of CO2-neutral powertrains. Quantum sensor technology can also help push the boundaries of neurological diagnostics and take the diagnosis of Alzheimer’s, epilepsy, and Parkinson’s to a new level. You can find out more about Denner's view on quantum physics and other economic and technological questions in his CEO blog on our Bosch corporate website. #quantumtechnology #physics #quantumcomputing #sensortechnology #supercomputer #ceoblog

“I’m a wife to a black man, I have two black sons, I have a dad, I’m a sister. Reflecting upon what happened in the United States and making a personal connection to these situations enraged me and has been an awakening in many ways.” Mondraea Calvin, HR Business Partner for our regional team located in Farmington Hills, United States, is the president of African Ancestry @ Bosch. This internal resource group's mission is to position the company as an employer of choice where current and future employees of African ancestry feel valued, empowered to contribute and to develop and cultivate their own as well as the company's success. Together with other members of the resource group, Mondraea has opened a discussion about race, social unrest, and the impact of it on family dialogue and the work environment. Listen in as they share their personal stories and how to approach conversations about race on our "Beyond Bosch" podcast. You can find the episode on all common podcast platforms. 🎧At Bosch, we stand for respectful cooperation and we are setting clear signals against discrimination and racism. We have been dealing with the topic “unconscious bias” for years and thus we are promoting the reflective handling of prejudices and stereotypes. Workshops have been held around the world in which associates address the influence of unconscious bias on their actions.#FightRacism #Standup4humanrights #againstracism #corporateculture #diversity

🚨👀 Whether at home, while traveling, in the holiday house, garden shed or garage: With spexor, we have developed a mobile alarm device that you can use flexibly in almost any location and for a wide range of applications. Spexor comes in the size of a coffee cup and can be placed almost anywhere where security is important to you. A Wi-Fi connection or cellular network is all spexor needs to do its job. The device scans the surrounding environment with its sensors and detects a break-in by evaluating a combination of air-pressure, noise, and motion sensor signals. It then triggers the alarm and sends an alert to your smartphone. Spexor is not only a smart alarm device that warns you in case of an intrusion, but can also measure and assess the air quality in closed rooms. Via the spexor app, the device informs you when it is time to ventilate. Proper and regular ventilation can reduce the risk of infection and contain the spread of viruses indoors.#alarm #alarmdevice #alarmsystem #mobilealarm #security #intrusiondetection #breakindetection #securitysolution #sensortechnology #motionsensor #soundsensor #noisesensor #airquality #indoorair #ventilation #spexor @boschspexor

💡 Quantum technology has an immense power. It will allow us to do computing tasks that are outside of the reach of even the best computers today. Artificial intelligence, which is designed to analyze huge amounts of data, could benefit from this, as could materials and pharmaceutical research. Also, quantum is one way to really secure the Internet and the communication in the Internet of Things. What's the big secret behind quantum technology? And what impact will it have on our everyday lives? Watch the video to learn more about quantum from Shohini Ghose, professor of quantum physics and computer science at Wilfrid Laurier University in Waterloo, Canada!#quantum #quantumtechnology #quantumcomputer #quantumcomputing #quantumphysics #artificialintelligence #ai #iot #internet #internetofthings

⌚ 🎧 Zoomed in: Did you know that tiny sensors are very helpful companions in our everyday lives? Some of their miniscule components are 10 times smaller than the leg of an ant. 🐜 These so-called MEMS sensors power the gesture control of your wireless earbuds, track your activity to give you control over your fitness, and help you navigate through the city quickly and easily. All this thanks to the internal silicon structures of the sensors which can convert microscopic motions into electrical signals, process this information, and transmit it. This way you can enjoy your connected lifestyle! At Bosch, we are producing more than 4 million MEMS sensors for consumer electronics and mobility solutions every day. #outdoors #fitness #running #runningmotivation #runnersofinstagram #instarun #runners #runnersworld #fitnesslifestyle #healthy #lifestyle #sensors #MEMS #connectivity #IoT

🌲🔥⚠️ When it comes to the detection of forest fires, time is of the essence. Our digital gas sensor with artificial intelligence can help detect forest fires in a timely manner. Developed by Bosch Sensortec, it is the first air quality MEMS sensor that combines gas, humidity, temperature, and barometric pressure sensing with an innovative artificial intelligence (AI) capability; essentially creating the world’s smallest four-in-one air quality measurement solution. And it can not only be used outdoors for the detection of forest fires but offers a wide range of applications, including the detection of food spoilage in the fridge.#sensortechnology #sensor #artificialintelligence #AI #AIoT #IoT #tech

❄️⛄🌡️ Winter wonderland outside, warm and cozy inside: The Logatherm WLW196i AR S+ air-to-water heat pump by our Bosch brand Buderus remains fully operational down to minus 20 degrees. It converts inexhaustible natural energy from the ambient air into thermal energy for heating and hot water. 🏢 The building sector is responsible for about 30 percent of all carbon emissions. Therefore, switching to more sustainable heating systems is essential. Bosch introduced its first heat pumps nearly 50 years ago – a technology that uses the environment in order to protect it.🤫 However, the Logatherm WLW196i AR S+ air-to-water heat pump not only supplies residential areas with eco-friendly energy, it also contributes to keeping the neighborly peace. Thanks to its "Silent Plus" technology, there's hardly any noise to be heard.#sustainability #sustainable #heating #heatpump #buderus #boschthermotechnology #ecofriendly

🏃🏋️🚴 How do you stay fit during "corona-tine"? Our From KNOW-HOW to WOW podcast hosts Melena and Geoff had the chance to try something brand new – a  technology that revolutionizes fitness tracking. Listen to the latest episode to find out more! 🎧👉 The world’s first self-learning AI sensor for wearables and hearables is based on Edge AI. Having an “edge” like that on your wrist makes your fitness tracker individually tailored to you and the way you move. With each movement it adjusts itself. 👉  The sensor provides more reliable analytics and reduces the need for data storage space, eliminating data transmission to the cloud. So you are in control of your data. That jumping jacks sometimes can get out of control, however, is a different story. Melena can tell you about it... 🏎️⚡Get ready for electrifying motorsports: We've entered a long-term technology and engineering partnership with @dragonracing_fe for the racing team's cars in the @fiaformulae.As the all-electric racing series' regulations prescribe the use of many systems, the performance of the electronic system makes a decisive contribution to racing success. As part of the cooperation, we'll be developing an electronic vehicle management system tailored to the requirements of the Formula E vehicle which will help the racing team to exploit the vehicle's full potential. The system is set to be deployed for the first time in a race this spring and includes electronic software and hardware components. 🏆🏁#emobility #boschmotorsport #motorsport #wesetthepace #ABBFormulaE #racing #software #tech

☀️ Being greeted by Malaysia's largest rooftop solar panel installation upon arrival: We've recently completed the installation of 7,500 solar panels at our automotive electronics plant located closely to Penang Airport in Malaysia.Covering a rooftop area of 24,500 square meters, the site is one of the largest solar power plants in the country and is able to generate 4,500 MWh per year – that's the equivalent to the yearly power consumption of 1,300 Malaysian households. 🏘️The solar panels produce enough electricity to cover up to 20% of our plant's energy consumption, contributing to our overall carbon neutrality strategy and global climate action efforts. 🍃#climateaction #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #sustainability #sustainable #solarenergy #csr #energyefficiency #renewableenergy

🚘🔧 Sell, install, repair: Did you know that 50 million cars are serviced and repaired in the "Bosch Car Service" network each year? And if that number wasn't astonishing enough, the history of our customer service – formerly called "Bosch Service" – already goes back 100 years. Starting in the 1920s, car and motorcycle workshops that could fulfill certain criteria with regard to their equipment, size, and customer base were allowed to use the name “Bosch Service”. They were given testing and repair equipment, and were granted special conditions for the sale of Bosch spare parts. 🌐 Today, all Bosch service centers make up one of the world’s largest independent workshop networks with over 15,000 centers in more than 150 countries. #boschhistory #historyfacts #carworkshop #automobile #carservice #spareparts #customerservice #servicenetwork

🚘🌐 Updating vehicles wirelessly as smoothly and conveniently as a smartphone? We've teamed up with @microsoft to create the conditions to achieve exactly that! Software will play an increasingly important role in future vehicle generations. Electromobility, automated driving, and modern mobility services wouldn't be possible without it. But stringent safety requirements and a wide range of different series and models makes the implementation of wireless software updates and digital services for cars increasingly complex. That’s why, together with Microsoft, we are developing a software platform to seamlessly connect cars to the cloud.For drivers, the comprehensive platform for software-defined cars will mean quicker access to new functions and digital services. It will also empower automakers to develop new functions and get them on the road faster.#mobility #emobility #automateddriving #software #softwaredevelopment

🍅🥦🍞 Did you know that a third of all food produced globally goes to waste? And that the food we waste is responsible for roughly eight percent of global emissions? Food Connect is a food distribution initiative in Milton Keynes, UK, that was founded by London-based charity @hellohubbub. When they reached out to @boschebikesystems, our colleagues were more than happy to help. By using eCargo bikes, equipped with Bosch drive units, the Food Connect team collects unwanted food and delivers it to those who need it and those that simply don't want it to go to waste. During the national lockdown in the summer of 2020, Food Connect delivered more than 2,000 food parcels to vulnerable households and diverted more than 21 tons of food from waste. With their mini-fleet of eCargo bikes and an electric van, the initiative aims not only to tackle the enormous environmental challenge of food waste, but also to contribute to cleaner air for Milton Keynes.#sustainability #sustainable #foodwaste #co2 #emissions #uk #miltonkeynes #ebike #electricdrive #emobility #cargobike #ecargo #electricvehicle

Combining climate action with the excitement of an electric off-road racing series: @ExtremeElive is an all-electric SUV racing series, which is set to start its first season in April 2021 – with Bosch Power Tools as the official power tool supplier. But how can a racing series contribute to climate action? As part of Extreme E’s five-event race calendar, some of the areas worst hit by the climate crisis will be visited to raise awareness and encourage change. Additionally, in each of the five race locations Extreme E aims to leave an impact through its legacy programs, which range from planting one million mangroves in Senegal to educating children in Greenland. #racing #racingseries #motorsport #emobility #mobility #powertools #climateaction

🧗🏽 Zoomed in: Climbing a frozen icefall – would you be brave enough? 💪😊 Watch extreme climber Bernhard Witz ascend the frozen walls of the Beta Block Super – one of Europe’s most challenging ice-climbing routes in the Swiss Alps. When hanging from a rope, being able to drill the holes for the safety anchors in a safe and easy way is crucial. With its power, light weight, and long battery run-time, our Biturbo-series rotary hammer is the perfect companion. #powertools #cordlesstools #18voltsystem #innovation #climbing #climber #extremesports #iceclimbing

👩‍🔬 "Women scientists at the forefront of the fight against COVID-19" is the theme of this year's International Day of Women and Girls in Science. That's why we would like to introduce you to one of our remarkable female researchers:🥼 Tanja Maucher is a research engineer in the area of molecular diagnostics at Bosch. As part of her daily work, Tanja focusses on the characterization and integration of biological analysis and proof processes into the Bosch Vivalytic lab-on-a-chip system. 🔬 The Vivalytic analysis device is one of our contributions in the fight against the coronavirus: With our rapid COVID-19 test, the device can provide reliable results within 39 minutes and is ideally designed for decentralized use to support testing in medical facilities and other institutions like nursing homes. #WomenInScience #technology #coronavirus #covid19 #pandemic #healthcare #tech #science #research

Live sustainable #LikeABosch! 🌱🌱🕺👧From washing machines, heat pumps, and dishwashers to power tools and electric drives: It is our goal to develop products that improve quality of life and that help conserve natural resources. As of 2020, we have also paved the way for our more than 400 locations worldwide to become carbon neutral. But this is just the beginning. The next step for us is to address emissions along the entire value chain, from procurement to product use. Bosch is the first automotive supplier to join the Science Based Targets initiative with a specific and ambitious target: by 2030, to cut upstream and downstream CO2 emissions by 15 percent. Find out more about our vision for a greener future: Watch the full video with Shawn, the hero of our #LikeABosch campaign, and his new teammate on our IGTV! #sustainability #sustainable #climateaction #IoT #internetofthings #dishwasher #heatpump #drill #washingmachine #ebike #electricvehicle #emobility #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #carbonneutralcompany

🔥🧯 In case of a fire, every second counts – not least to save lives. But in an airport or in a large warehouse, for example, regular smoke detectors, even though essential, might not be sufficient in detecting a fire quickly. Here, due to high ceilings and the time it takes for the smoke to rise and be detected by the smoke detector, valuable time could be lost and a fire could spread rapidly.That's why we've developed Aviotec, a video-based fire detection system that uses artificial intelligence to detect smoke and flames quickly and reliably – even in darkness. This allows for measures to be taken instantly to prevent the fire from spreading.Aviotec is only one example of how we at Bosch combine the Internet of Things (IoT) and artificial intelligence (AI) in an AIoT application to make connected products intelligent and your everyday life safer.#artificialintelligence #AI #internetofthings #IoT #AIoT

🚘⚡🍃 Into the future with electromobility and climate neutrality:➡️ On the road to sustainable mobility, we have already invested 5 billion euros in electrical powertrains – with another 700 million euros to follow this year to develop electrical mobility solutions, including fuel cells. And our efforts and heavy upfront investments in this area are paying off: Since 2018, we have acquired 90 powertrain electrification projects, including 30 last year alone. Electromobility will become one of our core businesses.➡️ As for our climate action efforts, we have achieved a significant milestone in 2020, despite the pandemic: According to in-house calculations, all of our 400 locations worldwide became climate neutral! And we don't want to stop there: We've agreed a binding target with the Science-Based Targets initiative to also cut CO2 emissions along our value chain by 15 percent by 2030.#sustainability #sustainable #climateaction #emobility #mobility #fuelcell

Globally, about 80 percent of wastewater is released to the environment without adequate treatment. A team in our Clayton plant in Australia managed to turn the tables! 🗑️💧 Manufacturing diodes for the automotive industry, the plant used to generate 165 tons of copper-contaminated wastewater per year. However, copper is a valuable metal. So the team from @boschaustralia found themselves asking: What if there was another way? What if we could treat the water and make use of the copper that it contains? To reclaim copper from the wastewater, they installed an electrolysis system, which circulates water between positively and negatively charged plates until dissolved copper is removed and a roll of metallic copper is produced. While the copper can be sold, the water is being re-used at the plant for chemical processes.Find out more about how our colleagues in Australia turned a profit on their waste and what else we can do to live more sustainably in the latest episode of our From KNOW-HOW to WOW podcast. Our podcast is available on platforms such as Podigee, Apple Podcasts, Deezer, Spotify, and more! Simply search for From KNOW-HOW to WOW! #sustainability #sustainable #renewable #wastewater #watertreatment #manufacturing #podcast #tech #australia #clayton

🍃 From the environmental idea to carbon neutrality: Did you know that in 1970 our annual report mentioned environmental protection for the first time? With the first comprehensive measures to enforce the Bosch environmental protection guidelines following shortly after that, the topic was made a top priority and investments in environmental protection measures throughout the Bosch Group have increased year on year ever since. For example: Our location in Nashik, India, operates the largest solar power plant in the country’s automotive industry with the aim to cover the plant's day time energy needs through solar power. ☀️Whether the early environmental protection efforts or the more recent measures taken – both have played a crucial part in paving the way for our locations worldwide to achieve carbon neutrality.#climateaction #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #sustainability #sustainable #solarenergy #csr #energyefficiency #renewableenergy

♻️🏭 Whether it's garden furniture made from pallets or old glass bottles used as flower vases: Coming across an old item that has been upcycled into something new isn't unusual for many people in their everyday lives.However, producing sophisticated industry technology from recycled material has hardly been possible – until now: A team of Bosch research experts is paving the way for it!Their goal: To turn old starter batteries into the housing for ultrasonic sensors. To achieve this, the team had to master a number of challenges. For example, after sourcing suitable raw material, in this case the old starter batteries, they had to find the right formulation to create a stable plastic compound for the sensor housing. This required a lot of testing for which the team has been using its own compounding facility for the production of plastic mixtures. With this machine, smaller quantities of the material were mixed recipe by recipe until one ultimately met all requirements and prevailed. The plastic mixture is then transferred to the Bosch production process where the injection molder uses it to mold the housings for the ultrasonic sensors. For the time being, the material is still being tested in small quantities in pilot projects. But the next steps to start mass production are already in progress. Additionally, work is also underway on other projects, such as solutions for automotive interior applications using recycled material.#sustainability #sustainable #csr #recycling #upcycling #manufacturing #industry

🐫 Camel-proofed: Our smart washing machines are able to save up to 38 percent detergent and ten liters of water per washing cycle. Dirt stains can become a permanent feature of your clothes if too little detergent is used during the wash cycle. However, if you use too much, the wash cycle is longer, leading to an unnecessarily high consumption of water and electricity.Thanks to the "i-DOS" automatic dosing system, our machine detects the size of the load, the type of textile, and the degree of soiling, while taking into account water hardness. Based on this information, it determines the correct amount of detergent. Watch the Live Sustainable #LikeABosch video on our IGTV to find out more about how to save resources #LikeABosch when washing your clothes! 👕#sustainability #sustainable #climateaction #IoT #internetofthings #dishwasher #heatpump #drill #washingmachine #ebike #electricvehicle #emobility #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #carbonneutralcompany

⛹️🏋️‍♀️🧘 A fitness tracker that can track your exercises reliably regardless of exercise type, individual performance style, equipment, and energy level? With the amount of different fitness exercises available today this seems to be simply impossible. But thanks to artificial intelligence it isn't! We have developed the world's first self-learning AI sensor for wearables and hearables. It recognizes and adapts to a wide variety of movements and is able to learn any new fitness activity that is based on repetitive, cyclical patterns. It also enables you to easily train devices with customized fitness activities to suit your needs. How? Find out! ⬇️💡 Thanks to the learning mode, you have the option to add new fitness activities to the standard set of over fifteen pre-learned activities, enabling you to customize the device to your individual needs. 📈 With the personalization feature, you can also adapt existing, pre-learned activities to your own individual style – increasing the accuracy of calorie count and activity analysis.💪 And with the auto track function, you can also automatically track fitness activities without any manual intervention and analyze their intensity with activity type and count over time – enabling the tracking of both endurance and strength training.#BoschCES #CES2021 #artificialintelligence #AI #connectivity #sensortechnology #tech #fitnesstracker #innovation

How do you navigate and charge a mini robot on the moon? 🤖🌙Together with Astrobotic, WiBotic, and the University of Washington, we're working on a solution for this challenge! As part of NASA's Tipping Point program, we are contributing our expertise in AI-driven intelligent data analysis and wireless connectivity solutions to enable the autonomous navigation of small robots on the lunar surface.This project is one example of how much potential the combination of artificial intelligence and connectivity offers – not just in space but on earth as well! At this year's virtual #CES2021, we are presenting intelligent AIoT solutions developed to benefit people and the environment. For example:We have developed a sensor that measures factors such as air quality and relative humidity and can also deliver information about the concentration of aerosols in the air – data that has become especially important in the fight against the coronavirus. We are also continuously developing intelligent, climate-friendly solutions to protect the environment, like our cloud-based energy platform which applies intelligent algorithms to reduce the energy consumption of machines in manufacturing. #BoschCES #CES2021 #artificialintelligence #machinelearning #AIoT #IoT #robotics #connectivity #sustainabilityVideo credits: Astrobotic

🌤️ Renewable sources of energy tend to be volatile. When it comes to solar power, for example, changes in sunlight intensity lead to fluctuations in the amount of power generated. So how can we make the best use of these renewable energy sources on our way to carbon-neutral production?The Balancing Energy Network from Bosch.IO plays a key role here. At our plant in Eisenach, Germany, the software tool combines all the relevant data regarding power generation with information on the plant’s power consumption. 🏭 By using artificial intelligence and machine learning, it can also predict whether production processes or the operation of building systems - and the power consumption that this involves - can be shifted to a more favorable time. In addition, the software analyzes historical time series in combination with various parameters such as weather forecasts and production schedules.That's how the Balancing Energy Network makes a key contribution to improving energy efficiency at our production site. It is also intended to deliver a blueprint for other Bosch plants worldwide. Want to know more about our efforts to make the future more sustainable? As part of this year's digital #CES2021 we will be presenting climate-friendly solutions for health, living, industry, and mobility. Stay tuned and follow our channel for more updates to come next week!#climateaction #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #sustainability #sustainable #csr #renewableenergy #energyefficiency #AI #artificialintelligence #machinelearning #industry40 #BoschCES

🚘👀 Better than the human eye: Our multi-purpose camera enables self-driving cars to recognize their surroundings more quickly and reliably than ever before. It uses artificial intelligence (AI) methods in a multi-path approach for peerless scene understanding.The MPC3 camera scans the road, processing information about what it sees with remarkable speed. Responding to an obstacle in its path, it triggers the appropriate response in an instant and if necessary the car brakes hard.Using AI methods, the camera can distinguish the roadway from the shoulder and identify objects. It uses neural networks and semantic segmentation to assign each pixel of an image to a defined category. Road markings are no longer needed to keep a self-driving car safely on track. Find out more at https://www.bit.ly/mpc3-ar#testtrack #boschrenningen #automateddriving #selfdriving #artificialintelligence #AI #algorithms #softwaredevelopment #machinelearning

🚘❄️ A system that keeps your car safely on track, even in critical situations: There was a time when driving on a wet road or a sudden evasive maneuver frequently ended in a ditch or against a crash barrier, and not rarely with fatalities or severe injuries. 25 years ago, a remedy was finally provided – the ESP® (electronic stability program) that Bosch and Daimler-Benz first launched in S-class vehicles in 1995. This pioneering invention was a breakthrough for road safety. Since the launch, the ESP® is estimated to have prevented almost half a million accidents involving personal injury and saved some 15,000 lives in the EU alone.We have been continuously developing the system further and even created a kind of ESP® for motorized two-wheelers. Nowadays, the anti-skid system is featured in over 80 percent of all new passenger cars worldwide. And there is even more to it: ESP® is the basic technology for many driver assistance systems, as well as for automated driving. At the proving grounds of our winter test centers like the one in Baudette, US, we carry out vehicle tests with systems like our ESP® under the harshest conditions. #mobility #safetysystems #roadsafety #carsafety #researchanddevelopment #automateddriving #stopthecrash

From connected vehicles to smart homes: As part of our yearly Bosch ConnectedWorld, the leading conference on IoT and digital transformation, we are showcasing what is already possible with the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence today, and how it can make your life easier. This year, we had a special guest, someone who has seen our planet Earth from a perspective not many people have: Former U.S. astronaut Mike Foale. 👨‍🚀🌍On stage, he demonstrated that setting off to the International Space Station isn’t all glamorous but rather a shaky matter. During his talk he explained how SoundSee, an AI-based sensor system he developed with Bosch, can help make life on the ISS easier and safer. 🛰️To learn more visit our website bosch.com/soundsee#IoT #internetofthings #AI #artificialintelligence #technology #digitalization #BCW20 #conference #sensors #space

🚲⚡ Nowadays virtually all bicycle types are available electrified. Over the past 10 years, eBike designs have developed rapidly. Want to know what the future holds? To mark this year's 10th anniversary of the Bosch drive system, @boschebikesystems presented its eBike Design Vision. The concept bike shows what is already possible today when it comes to functional design integration and explores what is achievable further down the line. It includes for example a carbon handlebar with a clean, linear design, and our Nyon on-board computer integrated in the middle of the cockpit. The drive and battery are fully incorporated in the white carbon frame structure. The concept bike is also equipped with our eBike ABS, with the unit being hidden behind the front luggage rack. #boschebike #ebike #FeelTheFlow #electricmobility #sustainablemobility #mobility #futuremobility

Join extreme climber Bernhard Witz on a spectacular ascent: Check out how he climbs the frozen walls of the Beta Block Super – one of Europe’s most challenging ice-climbing routes! ⛰️🧗‍♂️When attempting this breathtaking icefall climb in the Swiss Alps, Bernhard needs equipment he can rely on. Our Biturbo-series rotary hammer allows him to drill the holes into the rock that he needs for the safety anchors to which he attaches his ropes. The tool’s brushless high-performance motor, in combination with our 18V lithium-ion battery, delivers performance on a par with 1,000 watts of grid power. With the long battery run-time, there is no need for the ice climber to swap batteries throughout the day. And thanks to the tool's lightweight and compact dimensions, it easily fits into the climber's backpack - making it overall a truly reliable companion for a magnificent climb.#powertools #cordlesstools #18voltsystem #innovation #climbing #climber #extremesports #iceclimbing

🚘🅿️ Imagine parking without the hassle of searching for a free space and maneuvering around!The world's first driverless parking system was approved by the authorities in 2019. It was implemented in the parking garage at the Mercedes-Benz Museum in Stuttgart, Germany. The system called "automated valet parking" that we co-developed with @daimler_ag is an infrastructure-supported solution that provides a fully-automated drive-up and parking service. Since then we have been continuously developing the system. Together with @mercedesbenz and parking garage operator APCOA, we are working to provide the world's first commercial automated valet parking service at @stuttgartairport. Check out the video to find out how it works!#automateddriving #driverless #automated #parking #parkinggarage #mobility #futuremobility #collaboration

🍃 Do you think companies should take action for the climate? We do! That's why we have implemented measures and technologies to become carbon neutral at all of our 400 locations worldwide from 2020. And we are the first global industrial enterprise to do so. But we're not stopping at this: We'll be constantly working to reduce the CO2 emissions at our own locations even further. And have also committed ourselves to reduce the carbon footprint along our value chain. This means specifically: We have set ourselves the target, confirmed by the Science Based Targets initiative, to reduce our indirect emissions by 15% by 2030. This includes purchased goods and services, business travel, and also the transportation and use of our products. #climateaction #carbonneutrality #carbonneutral #sustainability #sustainable #csr #renewableenergy #energyefficiency

The year 2020 has been characterized by the global pandemic and presented unknown and unexpected challenges for every one of us. At Bosch, we have taken a number of measures in the fight against the coronavirus. To make sure our associates at Bosch locations worldwide are protected, we developed for example fully automated production lines for face masks which were put into operation earlier this year. The lines were developed by our special-purpose machinery unit in just a few weeks. #covid19 #pandemic #tech #innovation #2020 #theyear2020 #responsibility #collaboration

On the road, at home, or at work — you can find Bosch technology in many areas of your life. To find out how to live #LikeABosch follow our Instagram channel and check out our bosch.com website!#bosch #technology #tech #innovation

From the Internet of Things (IoT) to Artificial Intelligence (AI): We are constantly working on developing connected and intelligent solutions to improve all aspects of life.With the IoT, homes are becoming smarter, factories more productive, and mobility is taking on a fundamentally new form.AI offers major potential. This technology can, for example, optimize outcomes in areas like transportation, medicine, and agriculture. By 2025, the aim is for all Bosch products to either contain AI or to have been developed or manufactured with its help. Bosch's AI code of ethics is based on the following maxim: Humans should be the ultimate arbiter of any AI-based decisions.#bosch #AI #IoT #technology #artificialintelligence #internetofthings #connectivity #smarttech #tech #computerscience #digitaltranformation

Climate change is the biggest challenge humanity faces. That's why we're taking action: As of 2020, all 400 Bosch locations worldwide will become carbon neutral, making us the first global industrial company to do so. But that's not all: We want to reduce the CO2 emissions of our supply chains and shrink the carbon footprint of our products. In addition, we've established the Bosch Climate Solutions subsidiary which uses our broad industrial knowledge to support other companies as they progress toward climate neutrality.#bosch #corporateresponsibility #climateaction #sustainability #sustainable #greentechnology #climateprotection #environment #climatechange #carbonneutral #carbonneutrality

"Invented for life" means that our products and services are designed to spark enthusiasm, improve quality of life, and help conserve natural resources.#bosch #corporateresponsibility #innovation #sustainabilty #sustainable #greentechnology #technologythesesdays

Did you know that the development of the high-voltage magneto ignition system with spark plug in 1902 paved the way for Bosch to become a world-leading automotive supplier?Nowadays, our company is operating in many different areas from mobility solutions to industrial technology, to consumer goods, and energy & building technology.#bosch #tech #technology #innovation #manufacture #consumergoods #buildingtechnology #automotiveindustry #cars #vehicles

Today, over 400,000 Bosch associates worldwide are contributing to a unique corporate culture. We live by our values. This includes that we appreciate the diversity of our workforce for the enrichment it brings.#bosch #diversity #diversitymatters #international #intercultural #corporateculture #employeeappreciation #employeeengagement

Our company founder Robert Bosch was a visionary and an employer to whom it was extremely important that his associates had the opportunity to apply their skills and use their potential to the full. As a socially-minded entrepreneur, he was also committed to improving the working and living conditions of his staff. He was one of the first employers in Germany to introduce the eight-hour day.#bosch #leadership #socialresponsibility #corporateresponsibility #corporateculture #employeeappreciation #entrepreneur #entrepreneurship #stuttgart

Robert Bosch founded the "Workshop for Precision Mechanics and Electrical Engineering" in Stuttgart, Germany, in 1886. This was the birth of today’s globally operating company. Right from the start, it was characterized by innovative strength and social commitment.#bosch #innovation #engineering #engineeringlife #mechanics #electrical #electronics #socialresponsibility #corporateresponsibility #stuttgart

Happy Diwali! To kick off the festival of lights, we asked Indian artist Amrita Marino (she/her) to share her vision of the special day, which includes music and dancing with loved ones. If you celebrate this holiday, what are some of your favorite traditions? “For me, Diwali brings back memories of an idyllic childhood, much of it sensory. The heady smell of diya wicks dipped in oil, the perfumed wax poured into earthenware pradeeps, our ancestral home in Kolkata teeming with extended family, and black-eyed fireworks (chorkee) spinning on the floor or ascending to great heights in a profusion of color and sparkle.” —@amritamarino Our Sephora community spans all cultures, and we are excited to highlight moments that hold special meaning throughout the year ❤️ We Belong to Something Beautiful.

Today we honor Indigenous Peoples’ Day. To help share our respect for diverse native history and cultures, we asked Diné (Navajo) artist Nicole Neidhardt (she/her) to create this powerful artwork that represents her vision of her community. “For me, this day celebrates that as Indigenous peoples, we are still here despite it all! We will continue to bloom like fireweed, and we are as diverse and beautiful as all the stars in the sky. Today reminds us all that Indigenous futures cannot be erased.” —@navabear12 Our Sephora community spans all cultures, and we are excited to highlight moments that hold special meaning throughout the year ❤️️ We Belong to Something Beautiful.

It feels like we’re online more than ever, and on World Mental Health Day, it’s a reminder how much digital hate and harassment can affect our well-being IRL. That’s why we’re growing Hearts, Not Hate, by partnering with nonprofit @righttobeorg to provide resources that support and promote safe social spaces. We’ll have more to share in 2023—until then, check out righttobe.org/our-training for some super-helpful info ❤️

Here's how this effective formula does it all: ✨ A 10% blend of encapsulated vitamin C (with five forms of vitamin C) gently releases over time to visibly brighten dark circles and even tone.✨ 3% niacinamide blend targets and brightens under-eye shadowing. ✨ Green caffeine and peptides help visibly firm, depuff, and strengthen to give you that wide-awake look. ✨ Guava extract and seed oil infuses skin with antioxidants and helps improve skin luminosity. L’Oreal Men Expert has partnered with @movember for five years and we strongly believe that when men share their vulnerabilities it is a strength, not a weakness. Join our inspiring ambassadors in supporting @movember and getting more men to be open and show their vulnerable side.

 

Head to the link in bio to learn more about Movember & make a donation!

 

#LOrealMen #MenExpert #BarberClub #MentalHealth #Movember #DontManUpOpenUp #WorthIt #ChangingTheFaceOfMensHealth

This year @movember and L’Oréal Men Expert celebrate their 5-year partnership. That's 5 years dedicated to tackling men’s health on a global scale, together.

Each November provides an opportunity to continue the conversation about men’s mental health and shine a light on the struggles that they face. With help from some practical tools, we want to get even more people talking about men’s mental health - so that they don't have to suffer in silence. Like @nikolajwilliamcw, we have your backs (and your beards). Check out the link in bio for more info.

This is Made To Be Remade 🔁

Where the end of one product, is the beginning of the next.

How it works:
1. You wear it down
2. Scan the QR code and return it back to us
3. We clean it, shred it, melt it, and remake it into something new for you to love.

It’s just one more way that, together, we can help end plastic waste 🌎

Check out the new collection in the link in our bio.

#MadeToBeRemade

That sneaker shredding though 👀 

Introducing: Made To Be Remade. Products that are designed to be worn down, returned, and then made into something new (hence the shredding)

Where the end of one product is the beginning of the next, so that together, we can help end plastic waste.

Learn more about #MadeToBeRemade in the link in our bio 🌎

We saw the possibilities in turning plastic waste into opportunity. That what’s best for the athlete must be better for the planet. With products made to be remade and products made with nature, all people can see the possibilities too, in helping to end plastic waste, so we still have places to play.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothingStory narrated by Henry Golding (@henrygolding).

@tifannyabreu10 only saw possibilities. To be a Trans Woman. A professional athlete. And an inspiration—for all of us—to be whoever and whatever we want to be.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothingStory narrated by Urias (@uriasss).

@ninja saw the possibilities in change. That a gamer can be an athlete. And sport and minds can be changed, forever.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothingStory narrated by JuJu Smith-Schuster (@juju).

With @allbirds, we saw the possibilities in competitors working as collaborators. Together, we are sharing ideas and resources to become carbon neutral. So everybody can see the possibilities in a partnership to protect the planet.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothingStory narrated by Finn Wolfhard (@finnwolfhardofficial).

FUTURECRAFT.FOOTPRINT: Made to fit the planet. Together with @allbirds, we measured every step of the process. From growing materials to end of life. We're not at zero, yet. But we are proving that collaboration will get us there faster. #ImpossibleIsNothing #Futurecraft #TreadLighter

FUTURECRAFT.FOOTPRINT is the lowest carbon emissions performance running shoe we've ever created. Every step measured to draw down every last gram of weight and carbon to 2.94 kg CO2e per pair.Together with @allbirds, we're proving that the hardest part of tackling climate change is facing the challenge head on and making a start. We'll keep on, until every shoe, and every product, is made to fit the planet.#ImpossibleIsNothing #Futurecraft #TreadLighter

A year ago we saw the possibility to turn a competitor into a collaborator to accelerate our collective journey to carbon neutral. Today at 4PM CET we're unveiling FUTURECRAFT.FOOTPRINT. Made to fit the planet with @allbirds. It's the first time in history we hope others beat our personal best sooner.#ImpossibleIsNothing #Futurecraft #TreadLighterJoin the keynote event via the link in bio.

There’s no waiting for change. We see possibilities in standing with @layshiac, @chiney, @nnekaogwumike, @ecambage, @candaceparker, @mccoughtry, and @_bonnbonn, who use their platforms to demand justice.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothingStory narrated by Lena Waithe (@lenawaithe).

Turning @allbirds into colleagues has helped us go faster and further towards carbon neutral high-performance. And, we're sharing our secrets. Because together we can make our footprint fit the planet sooner. #ImpossibleIsNothing #Futurecraft #TreadLighterJoin us: link in bio.

When @charlyncorral looked at the pitch, she saw possibilities to cut through defenders and judgment. So all people can see the possibilities to turn challenge into opportunity.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothingStory narrated by Marion Reimers (@lareimers).
@hima_mon_jai saw the possibilities in being the first Indian woman to win track and field gold, inspiring us to see our own possibilities.What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothing

We never stop seeing the possibilities to go faster than ever before. It drives us to create our fastest running shoe. Ever. And then do it again.​What possibilities do you see?​#ImpossibleIsNothing​Story narrated by @samhandy.

We saw the possibilities to do what’s never been done before. By turning thousands of footprint scans into the first 3D printed midsole, we are changing the future of sport. Forever. What possibilities do you see?#ImpossibleIsNothing Story narrated by Iddris Sandu (@iddrisandu).

@avtrusova saw the possibilities in becoming the first woman to land three quads, inviting us all to see the possibilities in landing our own “firsts.”​What possibilities do you see?​#ImpossibleIsNothing​Story narrated by Masha Komandnaya (@komandnaya).

@damianlillard only sees possibilities. By elevating the moment through his game and his voice, so we can all see the possibilities of turning Dame Time into our time. ​What possibilities do you see?​#ImpossibleIsNothing​ ​Story narrated by Candace Parker (@candaceparker).

@mosalah saw the possibilities in changing minds by being himself. He stayed true to his game so that all people could see the possibilities of celebrating our differences, together.​What possibilities do you see?​#ImpossibleIsNothing​Story narrated by Ramy Youssef (@ramy).

@cyrillgutsch sees possibilities in giving ocean plastics a new home. Where imagination meets collaboration. Where plastics are turned into products. And where we all see the possibilities too, in taking action to help end plastic waste.​What possibilities do you see?​#ImpossibleIsNothing​#EarthDay

@beyonce saw the possibilities of inviting us all to find our voice. To use her platform as a stage to celebrate our differences, with all people. With you. Me. Them. Us.What possibilities do you see? ​#ImpossibleIsNothing​

Meet Stan Smith Mylo. Featuring an upper that is partially created with Mylo material, a nature-based alternative to leather. Mylo is made with mycelium, the root-like structure of mushrooms, harnessing natural technologies, billions of years in the making, to shape the future of footwear.Built With Biology Crafted With Humanity #MadeWithNature #EndPlasticWaste #StanSmithForever Thanks to @Mylo_Unleather​

Fast fact: Plastic waste is a mountain problem. It’s found everywhere from the steepest peaks to the deepest corners of our planet. But when the stakes are high, we don’t back down. Join trail runner Timothy Olson (@timothyallenolson) for a run and clean-up event that can bring us one step closer to healthy, waste-free ecosystems. Tune in and lace up—it’s time to climb 🗻  #EndPlasticWaste

Building a bridge from the past to the future is the marker of Black excellence — here and now we champion Black resilience, grace, power, and vision for today and for tomorrow. Honoring Black Excellence is our initiative that celebrates the achievements of Black individuals, and Black culture as a whole. Throughout the year, we’ll spotlight honorees by sharing their stories on the platform you’ve given us. This is just the start of celebrating our Black Community. Learn more about Honoring Black Excellence at news.adidas.com #HonoringBlackExcellence

“adidas and Fear of God share the same dream for the future of basketball, on and beyond the court, and we look forward to changing the face of the industry through a new model that will unfold before us in the coming years.” - @JerryLorenzo, creative visionary, designer, owner and founder of Fear of God⁣⁣Welcome to the family, Jerry.

“It means the ability to make a difference and change the lives of so many young people.” - Coach Maisha​​Legacy is a program that helps us break barriers in sport and education in underrepresented communities. There are 27 schools already in the program, but @adidasHoops is just getting started.​​We’re committing $1M to the Legacy Fund Scholarship as part of a larger $2.5M commitment to create scholarships for Black and LatinX youth in the next four years. We will partner with the United Negro College Fund to manage scholarships through 2024.​​To learn more about the Legacy program, head to adidas.com/Legacy

“It’s our job as athletes to create a safe environment, not just for ourselves but also for people around us.” - Vivianne Miedema (@viviannemiedema)⁣⁣ ⁣⁣That’s why this past week, athletes tapped into the power of their platforms by wearing a pair of #RainbowLaces (swipe 👉) to celebrate the impact and belonging of the LGBTQ+ community in sport.⁣⁣ ⁣⁣It’s our collective responsibility, as individuals and organizations, to make sport inclusive – and with @StonewallUK, we continue to take that step together.⁣⁣#adidasFootballCollective

FUTURECRAFT.STRUNG⁣Coded thread by thread for speed.⁣⁣⁣⁣Imagine a shoe that's so synced to you, you almost can't feel it. STRUNG is first-of-its-kind textile creation tech made for just that. Our first proof of concept is FUTURECRAFT.STRUNG, made in partnership with @kram_weisshaar. ⁣⁣Every single thread of the shoe is individually selected and data-mapped for runners hitting 5m/sec. The result is a seamless, lightweight cocoon precisely tuned to how you really move. Read more now at adidas.com/futurecraft/strung #FUTURECRAFT

#FUTURECRAFT sets us on a journey to do things that haven’t been done before. Solving problems by hacking, prototyping, breaking, questioning. Wide open to new influences, perspectives, collaborations. Combining ideas and innovations to create real impact for the athlete. ​⁣⁣Everything #FUTURECRAFT we put out is to show where we are headed, the possibilities, the opportunity. This is our journey from where we are to what could be.

Pride is about coming together in joy, unity and solidarity - and now more than ever that spirit is needed. ⁣⁣⁣ ⁣⁣At the heart of the modern LGBTQ+ rights movement is the work of Black transgender and gender non-conforming activists during the Stonewall Riots. Today their fight continues not just for equal representation and rights, but for their lives. ⁣⁣⁣ ⁣⁣We understand that change happens when we work together and amplify each other, so with @AthleteAlly and @StonewallUK, we are celebrating the people from across our community. Swipe through to read their thoughts on what Pride represents for them and what it means to be an ally. ⁣⁣ ⁣⁣⁣Featuring: ⁣⁣1. @kai_isaiah_jamal (they/them) ⁣⁣2. @ashlynharris24 (she/her) ⁣⁣3. @layshiac (she/her/they/them) 4. @isaac.kim (they/them) ⁣⁣5. @tarikcarroll (he/him) ⁣⁣6. @gocharliem (she/her) ⁣⁣7. Quinn Edlin (she/they) ⁣⁣8. @tomdaley (he/him) ⁣⁣9. Madonna Cacciatore (she/her) and Robin McWilliams (she/her)
This is our commitment to the Black community, and the world. We can change, and we will. This is just the start.
Take action. Things won’t change unless we create that change.

Our roster of gamechangers came together under one team in Chicago to improve access to career resources and inspire hundreds of #adidasLegacy program youth. ⁣⁣For every superstar changing the game, there's a community behind them that made it possible. #ChangeIsATeamSport⁣

1.8 million recycled plastic bottles-turned-field. If this sounds like the future of football, that’s because it is.⁣⁣We believe that improving ocean health is a must for future generations. In an effort to educate and empower the youth to take action, we partnered with @umiamirsmas to explore the harm of plastic waste in the oceans and @parley.tv to unveil the first sustainable football field at South Florida’s Miami Edison High School. ⁣⁣This wouldn’t have been possible without the thousands of hours and hundreds of people that came together to help shape the community. #ChangeIsATeamSport

“As a runner, you typically have a few pairs of shoes you’re rotating through. You may need a different shoe for long runs, another shoe for speed. We might run through a pair in a month and a half. So ideally, you’d have different types that meet different needs, but each pair would be recyclable. A shoe like this could mean that I’m not chucking 10 pairs of shoes in landfill every year.” ⁣⁣Founder of @GirlsRunNYC, @JessieZapo is one of 200 [FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] beta-testers. She gave heaps of feedback on GEN 1 and returned it to us.  We remade it into Jessie’s GEN 2. Zero performance lost. Zero plastic waste. One step closer on our journey to end plastic waste.⁣⁣[FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] Made to be remade. ⁣⁣#FUTURECRAFT LOOP#adidasRunners

“Just 5 to 10 years ago, if you owned more than 20 pairs of shoes you were whack. You had a problem. Then it was normal to own 20, then 50, then 100 plus. We have to change our thinking to the opposite. Let’s give back the shoes instead of keeping them in the closet. I think we’re still quite far off from that sort of thinking being widely accepted, but the shift will happen fast if the whole industry backs into it.” ⁣⁣GEN 1 beta-tester and founder of @StapleDesign, @JeffStaple lives for releases. We heard his thoughts on [FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] and ideas on the future of the footwear industry. He gave back his GEN 1 and we remade it into his GEN 2. Zero plastic waste and one step closer to a culture of less. ⁣⁣[FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] Made to be remade.⁣⁣#FUTURECRAFT LOOP

“When I first heard about [FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] I was skeptical. There’s a lot of greenwashing around, and I like to dig deeper. GEN 1 is 100% recyclable and although there’s no waste created, GEN 2 still means adding virgin plastic into the stream, which isn’t going to work in the long run. My question is - at what stage do we reach 1:1 recyclability? That being said, I do think it’s really important that big companies invest in this kind of innovation. This generation of the shoe might not offer the complete solution yet, but it could get us there. I have my fingers crossed for the future.” ⁣⁣[FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] GEN 1 beta-tester @SophieHellyer is a surfer, writer and environmentalist. She gave her critique when she handed back her GEN 1 for regeneration into GEN 2. We thank her for holding us to account on every step of our journey to eliminating virgin plastic and ending plastic waste. ⁣⁣[FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] Made to be remade. ⁣⁣#FUTURECRAFT LOOP

We launched its beta test in April with a 100% recyclable running shoe. Now we’re at a critical point in the journey. For the first time, the return of a shoe is more important than getting it...​⁣⁣[FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] Made to be remade. ⁣⁣#FUTURECRAFT LOOP

This is just the beginning. [FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] Gen 2 is proof of progress for our first ever 100% recyclable, high-performance running shoe. Bringing us one step closer to a circular future and a world without plastic waste.⁣⁣[FUTURECRAFT.LOOP] Made to be remade. ⁣⁣#FUTURECRAFT LOOP

On this day in 1949, Adi Dassler registered the “Adi Dassler adidas Sportschuhfabrik” and set to work with 47 employees in the small town of Herzogenaurach. Since then, we have done our best for the best. We have improved and grown. We’ve made an impact not only on sport and athletes, but on fashion, music, sustainability and beyond..Each product represents a moment in our history over the last 70 years that helped shape culture and shift perceptions on what it means to be a sports brand. Looking ahead to the future, always remembering where we came from. “The Council just allowed me to have a family outside of my family, and it allowed me to have a sense of support. Having a collective of women around me that has a similar mindset is so soothing to my spirit, to my mind. We take care of each other without even thinking about it.” - @sheopatra_

The Council is a tight-knit all-female dance collective from LA providing a platform for emerging talent. The TSU Tigerbelles are known for the world records they broke, the style they pioneered, and the activism they inspired. Now, their legacy is the subject of an exhibit at the @ncrmuseum in Memphis, TN.

To celebrate the Tigerbelles, Nike commissioned an art installation—composed of over 20,000 track spikes—for display at the museum. Together with the museum, we also hosted multiple generations of Tigerbelles for a once-in-a-lifetime event to unveil the piece, bringing together 60-plus years of Tigerbelle history together in one room.

The exhibit will be on display for a limited time. Come visit the museum to witness history. Art fabricated by Gertrude East and Kevin Pierce.

#Nike50

Can 25,984 track spikes tell the story of a running dynasty? We hope so.

To celebrate the HBCU Tennessee State University’s female track team, the Tigerbelles, Nike partnered with @ncrmuseum for a larger-than-life art installation, depicting a famous photograph of track athletes Debbie Jones, Chandra Cheeseborough and Ernestine Davis crossing a finish line in 1978.

That year, the Tigerbelles set the World Record in the 880-yard indoor relay, the first-ever set by a Nike-sponsored team, collegiate or professional. Their story needs to be known, far and wide, because the Tigerbelles would change running—and athlete activism—forever.

Head to the link in our bio to learn more about the Tigerbelles.
#Nike50
